original: All The Mods 9 To The Sky
translation: All the Mods 9 翱翔天際

original: Welcome to All The Mods 9 now in the sky!
translation: 歡迎來到 ATM9 翱翔天際！

original:
Welcome to ATM9... Now With less flooring! 
 
 To get started with questing, check out the tabs on the left to jump in! 
 
 If you are new to AllTheMods, make sure to check out the &aAllTheModium&r Chapter! 
 
 If you are new to Skyblock packs or modded MC, check out the &6Main Questline&r to help you get started. 
 
 Note:  Mods are not gated by quests. Quests are optional.
translation:
歡迎來到 ATM9... 翱翔天際！ 
 
旅程開始前，查看左側各個任務章節開始遊玩！ 
 
若你是 ATM 系列模組包的新手玩家，務必查看 &aATM 金屬&r章節！ 
 
若你是空島類型模組包或麥塊模組的新手，請查看&6主線任務&r了解如何開始。 
 
注意：所有的模組發展不受任務限制。任務也是選擇性遊玩的，不是非得全部解完的唷！
為您介紹 ATM 金屬！

original: &dAllthemodium&r is the core mod in all Allthemods modpacks. This mod adds endgame ores to the world that amplify your modded experience. In 9sky however, you get this a little differently than you normally would.
translation: &dATM 金屬&r是所有 ATM 模組包的核心模組。這個模組在世界中增加了遊戲後期的礦物，加強了模組體驗。然而在本模組包中，取得的方式與你之前遊玩的略有不同。

original: The pulverizer is going to be your first step to making a soul infused ingot needed for Allthemodium. Pulverize some tin to get apatite, then pulverize some soul sand to get soul sand dust!
translation: 磨粉機是製作靈魂灌注錠的第一步，這是 ATM 金屬的必需品。將一些錫磨粉取得磷灰石，然後磨一些靈魂砂取得靈魂砂粉！

original: Make some soul infused dust first, then smelt it
translation: 先製作一些靈魂灌注錠，然後燒製成錠。

original: You will need some arcane crystal dust for Allthemodium, and it isn't common. Go ahead and sieve a bunch of dust for it (Iron/Diamond Mesh)
translation: 製作 ATM 金屬錠會需要一些神祕水晶粉，而這並不常見。繼續篩些塵土取得（鐵製 / 鑽石篩網）

original: Mundabitur dust is really annoying to craft, so I recommend just looting it from end cities.
translation: 潔淨粉的製作相當繁瑣，因此建議你直接到終界城市開箱掠奪些。

original: The nitro crystal is the hardest part of making allthemodium. You must progress through the &6Powah&r mod to get this. Go visit the questline! \n \nNote: Energizing through powah is how you actually craft the Allthemodium Ingot.
translation: 地獄之星電晶是製作 ATM 金屬中最困難的一步。你必須發展&6波瓦科技&r這個模組才能取得。到該章節發展任務吧！ \n \n注意：透過波瓦科技的充能室，也是製作 ATM 金屬的必要機制。

original: A simple alloy smelter. Combine gold, redstone, and glowstone to get your energetic alloy ingot.
translation: 一個簡單的合金爐。將黃金，紅石粉和螢石粉放入合金爐熔煉取得 energetic alloy ingot。

original: Combining osmium and glowstone in an osmium compressor gives you the following ingot.
translation: 將鋨和螢石粉放入鋨壓縮機中製作強化螢光石錠。

original: The Allthemodium block is how you make yourself an infinite allthemodium source. Your options are listed on the left.
translation: ATM 金屬方塊是取得無限的 ATM 金屬的方法。方法列舉如左。

original: The Ore Laser Base is incredibly easy to use, and is the best source of all of the &6Allthemodium Ingots&r. Place a base and attatch the drills to the sides of it (so they face down). Then place an ATM block in the left slot of the laser base and give everything power.
translation: 礦物雷射基座相當容易使用，且這是最棒的獲取 &6ATM 金屬錠&r的方法。放下基座並將雷射鑽放在基座的旁邊（雷射鑽面向基座）。然後在基座內的左側欄位放入 ATM 金屬方塊，然後對所有雷射鑽供電。

original: Go dive into &4&lBlood Magic&r&r to create this.
translation: 發展&4&l血魔法&r&r模組取得它。

original: Go dive into &aMystical Agriculture&r to create this.
translation: 發展&a神秘農業&r模組取得它。

original: Go dive into &dArs Nouveau&r to create this.
translation: 發展&d新生魔藝&r模組取得它。

original: Used as a catalyst to summon the Vibranium Ingot.
translation: 作為催化劑使用來召喚汎金屬錠。
恭喜你，但三個似乎不夠用...

original: Same deal as the Allthemodium Block, use this to make an infinite source of vibranium.
translation: 和 ATM 金屬方塊相同，可用來生產無限的汎金屬。

original: Tools and armor can only be gotten with a vibranium smithing template. And go make a laser base...
translation: 工具和裝備只能透過汎金屬升級鍛造模板取得。所以去弄一套雷射基座吧...

original: It's like the allthemodium apple, but better.
translation: 類似 ATM 金屬蘋果，但更好。

original: It's almost like an enchanted golden apple
translation: 大概類似於附魔金蘋果

original: Allthemodium armor, and the tiers above, all need smithing templates. They are insane though...
translation: ATM 金屬裝備，與其之上的各階裝備，全都需要鍛造模板.這太虧賊了...

original: An extremely rare ore that can only be found in the End Highlands biome.
translation: 一種極度稀有的礦物，只能在終界高地生態域中找到。

original: This can be crafted.. with a lot of allthemodium. Honestly, make an ore laser base at this point.
translation: 這是可以製作的...只要你有夠多的 ATM 金屬。老實說，趁現在弄一套雷射基座吧。

original: Same deal as the allthemodium template, needs a lot of vibranium. Laser base anyone?
translation: 與 ATM 金屬升級鍛造模板相同，需要相當多的汎金屬。弄一套雷射基座有人有意見嗎？

original: This item can be found as loot inside of the libraries in the Other &aDungeons&r.
translation: 這個物品能在異域&a地牢&r的圖書館中的箱子中找到。

original: Note: While the &aUpgrade Template&r is not needed to make the initial tool, it will save you a lot of &6Allthemodium Ingots&r! \n \nThese tools are unbreakable.
translation: 注意：製作一把 ATM 金屬工具其實並不需要&a鍛造模板&r，這能為你省下一堆的 &6ATM 金屬錠&r! \n \n這些工具是堅不可摧的。

original: The &6Allthemodium Metals&r can be used to make extremely fast furnaces! The allthemodium furnace smelts 16 items per operation (16x better than netherite).
translation: &6ATM 金屬&r能用來製作靠北快的熔爐！ATM 金屬熔爐每次運作能燒 16 個物品（比獄髓熔爐快 16 倍）。

original: Need more of the &6ATM Metals&r? Make some bees! \n \nOnly better than the ore laser base with Omega Upgrades (or lots of bees).
translation: 想要更多的 &6ATM 金屬&r嗎？做些蜜蜂吧！\n \n只有當放入 Omega Upgrades 時才會比雷射基座好（或是養一堆蜜蜂）。

original: Literally the easiest thing to make here
translation: 說真的是這些材料中最簡單的

original: Kill the Trader Villager and His Annoying Llamas
translation: 擊殺流浪商人與其擾人的商駝們

original: Here you'll find all of the rewards you can get by slaying enemies.
translation: 在這裡你可以找到擊殺這些生物能獲得的獎勵。

original: This page is a work in progress!
'While making a lot of the questlines for the ATM7, the Trader Villager thought it'd be funny to constantly push me around in the quest screen.
translation: 「當我在製作 ATM7 的任務時，流浪商人認為當我在編輯任務的時候，一直把我推來推去很好玩。

original: Take them out. All of them.'
This isn't even my final form.
translation: 這甚至不是我的最終型態。

original: On this page, you'll find some useful items and info to help you on your journey!
translation: 本章中，你能找到一些實用的物品和資訊，在遊玩的旅途中幫助你！

original: The mod &9Construction Wand&r adds helpful wands that are used when building. \n \n When right-clicking a face of a block with the wand, it will extend that face out as long as you have the blocks in your inventory.
translation: &9建築手杖&r模組新增了一些在建築很有用的手杖。 \n \n手持手杖對著方塊右鍵，只要身上有足夠的相同方塊，就能在該面上向外延伸放置方塊。

original: Some useful gadgets for building. \n \n &cDestruction Gadget voids blocks!&r
translation: 一些對建築實用的小幫手。 \n \n&c破壞小幫手會直接清除方塊！&r

original: It's an entire room in one block! \n \nOne size fits all! Not enough space? Make more!
translation: 整個空間塞在一格方塊內！ \n \n更高等級的有更大的內部空間。

original: The rending gale if you are unfamiliar is a method of creative flight! it requires small amounts of emc to run \n \n For EMC before a transmutation table, we recommend redstone/glowstone, or a klein star which is the battery of this mod, you can fill these in a projectE relay!
translation: 若你不熟悉烈風戒指，它是一種創造飛行的方法！它需要少量的 EMC 來運作。 \n \n至於在取得轉換桌前如何取得 EMC，推薦使用紅石或螢光石；或是這個模組的 EMC 電池，卡萊恩能量之星。你可以在反物質轉繼器中將卡萊恩能量之星使用 EMC 充能！

original: Easy item to automate infinite water. Need more water? Make another!
translation: 一個簡單自動化無限水源的物品。需要更多的水嗎？再做一台！

original: This is a simple magnet! \n \n Pro tip: You can set a keybind to toggle this on and off!
translation: 就是一個磁鐵！ \n \n專家提示：可以設定按鍵綁定來切換磁鐵開關！

original: Ever wanted to be taller? Or shorter? Or make mobs taller or shorter? Then the Personal Shrinking Device is perfect for you! \n \nRight Click to change the device configs for size. Shift Right Click to effect yourself and Left Click mobs to effect them.
translation: 想要變高嗎？或是變矮？還是想改變生物的身高嗎？那麼這個個人縮放裝置很適合你！ \n \n右鍵改變裝置的尺寸設置，潛行右鍵作用於自己，左鍵作用於生物。

original: When an infinite world is too small
translation: 當一個無限的世界太小了

original: Can be used as Reactor Coolant
translation: 能作為反應爐的冷卻劑
親愛的，我把自己縮小了

original: Is that crooked, or are my eyes funny?
translation: 這是歪了還是我眼睛壞了？
燧石剪刀，比鐵製的便宜！

original: For those who want to fast-track the start, this gives you an 'easy-mode' start. You do not have to complete this quest, and it is optional for progression.
translation: 對那些想要快速開始的人來說，這裡提供了一個「簡單開始」的方法。你也可以選擇不完成這個任務，對發展而言這是可選的。

original: Ran out of saplings? You can get some emergency saplings at the top right of the quest menu!
translation: 樹苗用光了？你可以在任務選單右上角取得應急物品樹苗！

original:
Welcome to All The Mods 9: To the Sky! 
 
 If you've played the original (or any skyblock ever), most of what you have to do should be self-explanatory up until the ATM metals. 
 
 If not, don't fear! These quests are here to guide you through the start. 
 
 Some of the quests in this chapter have in-game video-style Ponder tutorials! They will be given as rewards. Click the reward to watch a Ponder video to teach you all about the item!
translation:
歡迎來到  All The Mods 9 － 翱翔天際！ 
 
若你曾玩過原版（或任何空島生存），在取得 ATM 金屬前，要做的一推事應該是不言可喻的。 
 
若沒玩過也別怕！這些任務會引導你開始遊玩。
 
這章節中有些任務有遊戲內的教學思索動畫！作為任務獎勵的方式呈現。點擊領取獎勵來觀看思索動畫來教你關於這個物品的知識！

original: Chop down the tree. \n \n &9IMPORTANT&r: Yes, being a skyblock, you can spam crouch to make anything, including your trees, grow faster.
translation: 把樹砍倒。 \n \n&9重要&r：沒有錯，這裡是空島，你可以施展蹲下跳舞，讓包含樹苗和作物的任何東西長得更快。

original: Crooks will give you a much better chance of getting saplings and apples from leaves, but is also how to get silkworms. You will need these to get string for further progression.
translation: 曲柄杖讓你從樹葉中，有更高的機率取得樹苗和蘋果，也是取得蠶寶寶的方法。為了發展你需要蠶寶寶才能取得線。

original: To get string in a skyblock some might say it is easier than prior... you will want to grow a tree, add a silkworm to one of the leaves and watch those spread across all the leaves! Once done, harvest these with your crook!
translation: 在空島中要取得線，有些人可能會說這比以前更容易... 種下一棵樹，對一個樹葉使用蠶寶寶，然後看著這東西擴散到整片樹葉！完成後，用曲柄杖破壞它們！

original: Sieving is your most common method of gathering resources in this modpack, and most materials can be acquired this way! \n \n You can also sieve blocks 25 at a time by making 25 Oak Sieves, and placing them in a 5x5. Right-clicking the middle Sieve with the item you want to sieve will use 25 instead of 1. Each of them do need meshes.
translation: 在這包中，篩礦是取得各種資源最普通的方法，且大部分的材料都能用這個方式取得！ \n \n你也可以製作 25 個橡木篩網架，5x5 放置，同時篩 25 個方塊。對中間的篩網架右鍵要篩的方塊，這會同時使用 25 個而非 1 個。當然每個篩網架都需要篩網。

original: Compress 9 of a block into its compressed form, then run it through this sieve.. It's 9x faster after all
translation: 將 9 個方塊壓縮成 1 個壓縮方塊，然後改用這個來篩... 基本上就是 9 倍速的篩礦。

original: Just like other skyblocks, you can get pebbles from shift-right-clicking grass, but here it works a little differently. \n \n You have a 50%% chance for cobblestone pebbles, and a 50%% chance to get any of the other pebble variants.
translation: 和其他空島包一樣，你能對草地蹲下右鍵取得石塊，但這包的機制略有不同。 \n \n有 50%% 的機率取得鵝卵石石塊，50%% 的機率取得其他種類的石塊。

original:
In Skyblock you'll be getting a lot of basic items for processing like cobble, sand, and dust. 
 
 To save room you can compress them by combining 9 in a crafting table. 
 
 If you want to hammer them in bulk you'll need...
translation:
在空島中，發展中你會取得大量的基礎物品像是鵝卵石，沙和塵土。 
 
為了節省空間，你能在工作台中將 9 個物品合成為 1 個壓縮版的物品。 
 
若你想要大量捶打這些物品，你會需要...

original: A faster way of hammering for Gravel or Sand is by hammering Compressed blocks. Normal hammers won't work though, so you'll need a Compressed Hammer!
translation: 捶打壓縮版方塊，是一種快速的方式取得礫石或沙。普通的鎚是無法使用的，因此你需要壓縮鎚！

original: To get resources, we'll need to bust up our cobblestone into something we can sieve. \n \n This is where the hammer comes in. Place down the block you want to hammer, and.... well.. hammer it.
translation: 為了取得資源，我們需要一些除了鵝卵石之外的材料來篩。 \n \n這就是為什麼需要鎚子。把想要搥打的方塊放出來，然後... 嗯... 搥它。

original: Most of the starting journey will be getting materials via Sieving. We'll learn more about that in the next quest. \n \n Don't be afraid to make a ton of gravel. Sieving gravel is how you progress!
translation: 大部分旅程的開始都是透過篩礦來取得材料。在下一個任務中會學到更多知識。 \n \n別怕製作大量的礫石。篩礫石正是你推進度的方式！

original: Shears but flint.. Use this to collect leaves from your trees
translation: 剪刀但是燧石製... 用這來從樹上蒐集樹葉。

original: Get ready to make free water with these!
translation: 準備好用這個製作免費的水！

original: You are about to be sieving a lot of blocks. Use ultimine for fast mining with a hammer and perhaps get an autoclicker ready! \n \nYou can set up multiple sieves like this to sieve up to 25 blocks at once.
translation: 差不多是時候要篩大量的方塊。用鎚連鎖挖掘來快速搥打大量方塊，或許也需要準備個滑鼠連點器！ \n \n你可以像這樣設置多個篩網架，最多能同時篩 25 個方塊。

original: With the Flint Mesh, you'll start getting some actual resources. \n \n If you are wondering what each mesh drops when sieving, you can always hit 'U' in JEI on the mesh to check out the list.
translation: 有了燧石篩網，才能取得一些真正有用的資源。 \n \n若你想知道各種篩網能篩出什麼東西，隨時在 JEI 中對著篩網按'U'查看掉落清單。

original: Sometimes, lower tier meshes drop certain loot more than higher tier meshes! Make sure to check drop rates in JEI
translation: 有時，較低階的篩網比起高階的，會有較高特定物品的掉落率！務必在 JEI 中查看物品掉落率。

original: Once you have a Flint Mesh, you will start to get basic materials from sieving, like Iron! \n \n Combine your ore pieces and make yourself raw ores, then throw them in your furnace to smelt them!
translation: 一旦有了燧石篩網後，你能篩出一些基礎資源，像是鐵！ \n \n把礦塊組合成礦，然後丟到熔爐熔煉！

original: If you surround a furnace with Iron in a crafting table, you can upgrade your furnace to an Iron Furnace. \n \n These smelt faster and can also be configured to be automated with the cogwheel in the top left of the GUI.
translation: 在工作台中，把熔爐繞一圈鐵錠，就能將熔爐升級為鐵熔爐。 \n \n這台燒得更快，且能在介面中左上角的齒輪設定自動化。

original: There are plenty of ways to generate your first bits of power. \n \n The RFTools Coal Generator is one of the easiest.
translation: 有需多方法能幫你發出一點點的電。 \n \nRF 工具模組的煤炭發電機是當中最簡單的。

original: If we want to get started with automation in ATM9:TTS, we'll need to dip our toes further into power. \n \n To continue our progression, check out the &aGetting Started: Part 2&r to keep moving forward!
translation: 若想在 ATM9 翱翔天際中真正開始自動化作業，那我們就必須繼續探索未來的發電方案。 \n \n繼續我們發展的旅程，查看&a由此開始：第二部分&r來繼續前進！

original:
The barrel is one of the most important ways to get materials in this pack, second only to the sieve. 
 
 These can make clay using water, soulsand using witchwater, and even create dirt from saplings. 
 
 Note: These will fill with water when it rains.
translation:
木桶是這包取得資源最重要的方式之一，僅次於篩礦。 
 
這能用水製作黏土，用巫水做靈魂砂，甚至用樹苗做泥土。 
 
注意：下雨時會被雨水灌滿。

original: When placing a barrel on top of mycellium and filling it with water, it produces witch water. This can be used to make soul sand, netherrack, and blackstone. \n \n&lCheck JEI on this bucket&r
translation: 當木桶放在菌絲土上，並灌水在其中，水會變成巫水。這能用來製作靈魂砂，地獄石和黑石。 \n \n&l在 JEI 中查看巫水桶&r

original: This one has been changed, the recipe is now adding Milk to Water in a barrel.
translation: 這個配方改變了，現在是對灌水的木桶使用牛奶。

original: Fill a barrel with water and right-click it with Dust to get Clay.
translation: 對灌水的木桶右鍵使用塵土取得黏土。

original: Throw dust in a sieve to get some bone meal.

I mean its a skyblock, no matter how many different power generation methods we try to show you in these quests, you will ultimately end up with 20 of these in your base... \n \n These generate lava when a heat source is placed underneath it. You can use a torch to start with, even though it is slow. Fill with some sort of cobblestone.
translation: 我說因為這是空島，無論我們試著在任務中介紹了多少種不同發電方式，你終究會在基地裡放了至少 20 個這東西... \n \n當其正下方放置熱源時會生產熔岩。初期可以使用火把，雖然很慢。放入一些鵝卵石類的東西進去開始生產。

original:
Crucible heat sources are important as they make your lava production faster! This modpack has a few changes to the norm, so I thought I would add a list into the guidebook for you to show you the options 
 
 Blaze Mesh: 8 
 Uranium block: 20 
 Mekanism superheating element: 60 
 Dark matter block: 100
translation:
坩堝熱源是很重要的，因為能加速生產熔岩！這包改了一些東西，這邊列舉一些供你選擇： 
 
植物魔法的烈焰網：x8 
鈾方塊：x20 
通用機械的導熱元件：x60 
暗物質方塊：x100

original: Add cobblestone to a crucible, heat source underneath, and you got free lava! \n \n Connect a hopper to the crucible to pump in cobble automatically, this can get up to 4 buckets of lava in one crucible
translation: 在坩堝中放入鵝卵石，正下方放熱源，就能取得免費的熔岩！ \n \n用漏斗接上坩堝來自動輸入鵝卵石，一個坩堝中能容納最多 4 桶熔岩。

original:
If you don't want to be right-clicking the floor for the rest of eternity, make you one of these. 
 
 You'll need to make lava in your crucible, and you'll need enough iron to make 2 buckets. 
 
 Trust me, it's worth it. It auto-generates cobblestone, and will automatically export to an attached inventory, like an Oak Drawer from Functional Storage.
translation:
若你不想把餘生浪費在對地板右鍵，做一個吧。 
 
你需要在坩堝中製作熔岩，且有足夠的鐵錠做兩個鐵桶。 
 
信我一把，這很值得。它能自動生產鵝卵石，且能自動輸出至連接的容器，像是功能性儲存模組的橡木抽屜。

original: Use dirt in a sieve to get seeds, then spam sneak to grow your crops fast!
translation: 篩泥土取得種子，然後蹲下跳舞加速作物成長！

original: Cook some bread and get toast... Nearly as good as steak!
translation: 燒一些麵包取得吐司...幾乎跟牛排一樣好吃！

original: Learn about all things food by checking out the &aFood and Farming&r chapter.
translation: 查看&a農作與食物&r章節，習得更多食物的知識。

original: &aMystical Agriculture&r is an easy way to get a ton of loot, without even needing power! Go check it out.
translation: &a神秘農業&r是個取得大量資源的簡單方法，甚至不需要電！快去看看吧。

original: The Dank is like a mini shulker box, and it can automatically store certain types of items in it. \n \nSieving drops lots of annoying pebbles, you can store over a thousand of them in the dank though! Right click to open up the dank GUI, place the pebbles inside it, and click the 'P' at the top to set it to filtered pickup. This will now place pick up all of the pebbles!
translation: Dank 像是個迷你的界伏盒，且能自動儲存特定物品。 \n \n篩礦會掉落大量煩人的石塊，你能用它來儲存超過一千個物品！右鍵開啟它的介面，放入石塊，然後點擊上方的'P'設定過濾拾取。現在它就會自動撿起所有的石塊！

original: The stone barrel is used with lava. Can make blackstone and whatnot.
translation: 石桶適用於熔岩的相關製作配方。能用來製作黑石之類的東西。

original: Right clicking dirt with these seeds will cause it to turn into grass/mycelium. This will spread to surrounding grass!
translation: 拿著這些種子對泥土右鍵能將它轉換成草地或菌絲土。這能擴散出去！

original: Again, check JEI on the witch water bucket.
translation: 又一次，在 JEI 查看巫水桶。

original: For Those Who Want To Skip Forward
It just saves space and time!
Compressed hammering is still a thing!

translation: 完全就是過度使用的笑話

original: Does everything get an upgrade in this pack?
translation: 這包每個東西都有升級版嗎？
使用通用機械模組自動燒礦

original: Automated Ore Smelting with Thermal Expansion
translation: 使用熱力模組自動燒礦
是時候使用我們的電了...
是時候製作 ATM 金屬了！

original:
Being a skyblock, everybody knows about lava power, its always going to happen, and some people will even use it till the very end 
 
 Make sure your wire is connected to the red part to extract power.
 
TIP: You can use an ore hammer from AlltheOres to make your ingots into dusts and get yourself invar blend until you have a machine that can do so
translation:
對空島而言，每個人都知道熔岩發電的方法，每包都有這樣的方式，有些人甚至到大後期還在使用。 
 
務必將電線連接到紅色端才能輸出電力。
 
提示：你可以使用 AlltheOres 模組的礦鎚把碇變成粉，然後製作不變鋼粉，直到你有能做出不變鋼的機器。

original: A single wind turbine isn't a lot of power, so here are some ways to make even more!
translation: 一台風力發電機並不能發出大量的電力，這裡介紹一些能發更多電的方法！

original: This hammer can be used to turn ores into dusts, at a rate of 1 to 2! You can now double all your ores with this hammer, and even make steel dust.
translation: 這個鎚子能將礦變成粉，一比二！你現在能用這個鎚子將礦物倍化，甚至能做鋼粉。

original: Go visit the &aProject E&r questline to see how this mod can be used to get tons of resources!
translation: 前往&a等價交換&r章節，查看關於這個模組是如何取得大量資源的！

original: A lot of resources come from mobs in a skyblock world, most importantly, bonemeal and ender pearls. \n \nStart by either making an unlit platform around 30 blocks away from you, or making a standard vanilla mob farm.
translation: 在空島中，有一大部分的資源來自於怪物掉落物，最重要的是骨粉以及終界珍珠。 \n \n初期可以在 30 格遠的地方打造一個黑暗的大平台，或是弄個原版的生怪場。

original: Cows, sheep, chickens, all need grass to spawn. Either build a dirt platform far away and use grass seeds in the center, or make this gate which will spawn these animals for you! \n \nNote: There's a small explosion when you spawn it.
translation: 牛，羊，雞等生物都需要草地才會生成。看是要在遠處打造一個泥土平台，然後使用草種子弄一片人工草原，或是做這個傳送門，為你召喚這些動物！ \n \n注意：召喚時會有小小的爆炸。

original: Steel is a very important crafting ingredient for lots of machines, get some by making steel dust.
translation: 鋼是個非常重要的材料，用來製作許多機器，用鋼粉來製作一些。

original: These cables are really cheap for the amount of power they can transfer, really worth making.
translation: 這些線纜相當划算因為它的傳輸量很不錯，相當值得製作。

original: The iron furnace can be used to generate power, and smelt using power. On top of that, it's just faster in general. Very useful.
translation: 鐵熔爐能用來發電，或是用電來熔煉物品。最重要的是，它比原版熔爐快得多。相當實用。

original: The generator augment turns the furnace into a power generator, this makes it almost the same as your coal generator from earlier, just not as good yet.
translation: 發電機升級套件將熔爐轉換成發電機，這使它幾乎和先前的煤炭發電機相同，只是還沒那麼好用。

original: If you combine this with the generator augment, you can smelt lapis, iron, diamonds, and more into energy. This produces A LOT more energy, and can provide a nice boost.
translation: 若將此升級套件與發電機升級套件合併使用，你能使用青金石，鐵，鑽石和更多其他東西來發電。這能產出「遠多於」先前的發電量，並提供不錯的加速。

original: The crusher can crush organic products, like potatoes, into biofuel. Needed for biofuel power generation (very good).
translation: 粉碎機能粉碎有機物（像是馬鈴薯）變成生物燃料。用來作為生物能發電機的發電材料（很不錯的發電）。

original: Potatoes are great to be turned into this, check &eMystical Agriculture&r for a good early farm design.
translation: 馬鈴薯是做個東西不錯的原料，查看&e神秘農業&r模組設計一個好用的初期農場。

original: Covalence dusts are turned into other resources with the use of &aProject E&r. These are going to be used soon..
translation: 共價粉是由其他資源轉換而成的，用於&a等價交換&r。很快就會用到了...

original: The energy condenser is a very simple converter, which can turn items with an EMC value from one to another, just place it in the top left slot and add in some covalence dust.
translation: 能量聚集器是個簡單的轉換器，使用 EMC 將一個物品轉換成其他的，在左上角的欄位中放入想要的物品，然後放進一些共價粉。

original: This is definitely the preferred storage system in this pack as it has compatibilities with &aProject E&r and has &bApplied Flux&r for amazing power storage. \n \nAn advanced storage system. It allows for the best automation and autocrafting, but it is harder to learn than Refined Storage.
translation: 在這包中絕對是首選的儲存系統，因為他能相容&a等價交換&r，並有&bApplied Flux&r模組能作為驚人的電力儲存方式。 \n \n一種高級的儲存系統。它能進行最棒的自動化與自動合成，但比起精緻儲存來說，學習相對困難。

original: A more simple storage system. Allows for good autocrafting and lots of item storage, but watch out when using disks with no type limits, throw in too many different items and your world won't like it.
translation: 一個更簡單的儲存系統。能進行不錯的自動合成與大量的物品儲存，但請注意，當使用無類型限制的磁碟，放入太多不同種類的物品時，你的世界不喜歡這樣。

original: Given water, power, and sometimes fertilizer, this will automatically farm whatever seed you put in there. \n \nCheck &eMystical Agriculture&r for more info.
translation: 提供水，電和一些肥料，它會自動種植你放入的任何種子。 \n \n查看&e神秘農業&r章節取得更多資訊。

original: The factory augment makes iron furnaces use power instead of fuel. \n \n&lThis makes them way better&r
translation: 工業化升級套件使得鐵熔爐使用電而非燃料運作。\n \n&l這使得它們更好用&r

original: This is easier to craft than the Flux Compacter, and it is faster. Set the crafting recipes to automatically make ores, and give the machine some power. \n \n&lClick the little snail icon at the bottom and the crafter will become way faster&r
translation: 比起通量自動壓縮機更簡單使用，且更高速。設定合成配方能自動製作礦，並對這台機器供電。 \n \n&l在介面下方點擊小蝸牛的圖示，能使機器運作得更快。&r

original: Mekanism machines are not really fast, but if you give them some speed cards, they can be up to 10x faster.
translation: 通用機械模組機器的運作並不是非常快，但若你安裝一些速度升級，最高能 10 倍快。

original: Tier installers can increase the amount of slots that the machine has. You can infuse or enrich much more ores this way.
translation: 工廠安裝器能增加原本機器的欄位數。藉此你能灌注或富集更多礦。

original: The thermo gen just needs a heat source and some water to produce power. Place it on top of lava and pipe in water and it's free energy. \n \nI recommend checking out the &ePowah&r questline for this.
translation: 熱力發電機只需要熱源和水就能發電。將它放在熔岩上方並灌水進去，就是個免費的能源。 \n \n推薦查看&e波瓦科技&r章節。

original: The block of blazing crystal has thermo gens making 280% more power, insane.
translation: 烈焰電晶塊能使熱力發電機生產 280% 的電力，太扯了。

original: Bonemeal some dirt and break grass to get these seeds. These are necessary for &aOccultism&r, which you will have to use in order to get your first netherite smithing template.
translation: 對草地灑骨粉打草取得這個種子。這是發展&a神祕學&r的必要物品，發展神祕學是你取得第一個獄髓升級鍛造模板的方法。

original:
The Possessed Hoglin drops a netherite smithing template. To summon one, you need to do the Abras' Commanding Conjure ritual. First go through the &aOccultism&r questline, and come back when you've done the &aChalking It Up&r quest. 
 
Once you're done, go find the Abras' Commanding Conjure ritual in the Dictionary Of Spirits under the Pentacles tab. Open it in the book and click the little eye at the bottom left of the display window to show a schematic of the ritual. After all of the items are in, kill a pig close to the golden sacrificial bowl to start the ritual. 
 
Hint: Use a mob swab on the possessed hoglin to make a spawn egg.
translation:
被附身的豬布獸會掉落獄髓升級鍛造模板。要召喚一隻，你需要進行阿巴拉斯強令召喚術。先發展一些&a神祕學&r的任務線，完成&a用粉筆畫地板&r任務時再回來。 
 
完成後，在魔靈全典中五芒星章節中，找到阿巴拉斯強令召喚術。點開它並點擊儀式圖示左下角的小眼睛，能在世界上顯示儀式的擺法。放好各種所需的物品後，靠近黃金獻祭之碗擊殺一隻豬來啟動儀式。 
 
提示：對被附身的豬布獸使用生物棉花棒，製作它的生怪蛋。

original: The Universal pipe can carry everything. Energy, fluids, gasses, and items! \n \nNote: Lots of pipes get laggy so I recommend using other mods, such as Applied Energistcs 2, to transfer items in the future.
translation: 通用管道能傳輸各種東西。能量，流體，氣體和物品！ \n \n注意：過多的管道會讓你的世界卡頓，因此推薦其他模組，例如應用能源 2，作為未來的傳輸物品的手段。

original: 4 Grass Seeds can be used to make moss. Moss is going to be used to begin &dArs Nouveau&r, which is a very powerful magic mod. In our case we will use it to make villagers. \n \nPhytogenic Insolators can be used to duplicate moss, or you can get them in an &aEnergy Condenser&r.
translation: 四個草種子能合成苔癬方塊。苔癬方塊是用來發展&d新生魔藝&r的，這是個相當強大的魔法模組。在此我們會使用它來製作村民。 \n \n有機灌注器能用來複製苔癬方塊，或是你也能使用&a能量聚集器&r來複製。

original: These saplings are necessary to grow Archwood Trees, the magical wood that Ars Nouveau uses in most of its crafting recipes. You can turn saplings from one into the other using a &6Manipulation Essence&r. Go check out the questline if you haven't yet.
translation: 這些樹苗是用來種植至高木樹，至高木是新生魔藝中大部分合成配方的必需品。你能使用&6操縱之精華&r將樹苗在這幾種類型中轉換。若你還沒的話，查看該章節的任務線。

original: Spawns a bunch of blazes. Make sure you have ranged weapons! \n \nNote: Hundreds of blaze rods
translation: 生成一堆烈焰使者。確保你有遠程武器！ \n \n注意：數百個烈焰桿。

original: Spawns a bunch of endermen. Build a roof over your head! \n \nNote: Hundreds of ender pearls
translation: 生成一堆終界使者。在你頭上蓋個屋頂！ \n \n注意：數百個終界珍珠。

original: Place a source jar near a ritual brazier and use the tablet on it, then right click the brazier with your hand. \n \nNote: Do this around 20 blocks away from your other structures.
translation: 在儀式火盆旁放個魔源罐，然後右鍵啟動火盆。 \n \n注意：遠離你的建築 20 格遠的地方使用。

original: Go slay the wither and obtain your first nether star, these are going to be pretty useful as you progress.
translation: 幹掉凋零取得你的第一顆地獄之星，對進度發展而言是相當有用的。

original: Nether star seeds are the easiest way to get an infinite nether star farm. Phytos for the win!
translation: 地獄之星種子是最容易取得無限地獄之星的方法。有機灌注機太神啦！

original: The infinity wand is unbreakable and can place over a stack of blocks, very nice for platforms.
translation: 無盡手杖是堅不可摧的，且能一次放置超過一組的方塊，蓋大平台的神器。

original: The angel ring lets you fly as if you were in creative mode.. but why? There's jetpacks..
translation: 天使指環能讓你像創造模式般的飛行... 有需要嗎？我們有噴射背包...

original: Shift click with this item to speed up machines, in fact, speed up anything! Accumulates time over time.
translation: 對機器蹲下右鍵能加速機器，事實上能加速任何方塊！隨著時間推移累積時間。

original: The summoning altar can be used from making stuff as simple as a cow, all the way up to the &6&lATM Star&r&r \n \nCheck JEI for its uses.
translation: 召喚祭壇能用來召喚簡單的東西像是牛，複雜的像 &6&lATM 之星&r&r。 \n \n用 JEI 查看它的用途。

original: The Marine Fisher is the best way to get access to the sea.. with no sea. Go visit &bIndustrial Foregoing&r to help you make this. It needs a pool thats at least 5 blocks wide to work, and if it somehow doesn't, make it bigger. (Give it power) \n \nThis can give you enchanted books, ink sacs, fish, and more, seriously worth it.
translation: 自動釣魚機是離大海最靠近的方法... 但不需要大海。查看&b工業先鋒&r章節幫你製作它。它需要至少 5 格寬的池子才能工作，還是不行的話，蓋更大的池子。（需要電） \n \n能釣到附魔書，墨囊，魚和更多東西，相當值得。

original:
Welcome to the custom auto sieve mod! It's slow without upgrades. 
 
These machines have no output inventory, the sieve outputs to the bottom, and the hammers output to the front, both auto output so you can have an entire system built without any pipes 
 
Note* these machines will NOT run without space in the output inventory, and the diagram below uses pipez as an example for item transfer, it &c&lWILL NOT&r&r work if built like the diagram without the proper filtering.
translation:
歡迎來到訂製的篩礦模組！沒有升級的話是相當慢的。 
 
這些機器沒有產物的容器，篩網輸出至底部，鎚輸出至前方，兩者都能自動輸出，因此你能不用任何管道打造整個系統。 
 
注意：若沒有輸出的容器，這些機器不會運作，下圖所示為使用管道傳輸的範例，若如圖建置的話，沒有用適當的過濾的話，這&c&l不會&r&r運作。

original: Compacts all ore chunks into ores. Just like the sieve, this machine auto outputs to the bottom!
translation: 將礦塊壓縮成礦。和篩網一樣，這台機器會在底部自動輸出產物！

original: Gold and Diamond upgrades stack to 3, hover over the upgrade to see the numbers for each!
translation: 金和鑽石升級能堆疊三個，滑鼠移到升級上方查看每個堆疊數量時的數值！

original:
The Pulverizer is a basic Thermal Expansion machine used to process 1 raw ore into 1 dust, with a 25%% chance to create another dust. This usually means about 25%% more ingots. 
 
 Make sure to connect power to it! 
 
 *Note: These can also be upgraded.
translation:
粉碎機是熱力模組的基礎機器，用來將一個原礦處理成一個粉，有 25%% 機率能獲得額外的一個粉。意思就是大概 1.25 倍的產率。 
 
記得要供電！ 
 
 *注意：這台機器也能升級。

original: This is the first Jetpack we'll make. It doesn't hold a charge for very long though. Mekanism energy cubes can be used to charge it. \n \nWireless power can be gotten later with flux networks or powah player transmitters.
translation: 這是我們將製作的第一個噴氣背包，即使它沒有太多的電容量能飛太久。通用機械的能量立方能用來幫它充電。 \n \n無線傳電之後能使用通量網路或玩家發射器達成。

original:
Let's make a Metallurgic Infuser. 
 
 This machine allows us to make several materials that can be used for power and more machines in the future. 
 
Put redstone in the yellow slot and iron in the blue slot to make infused alloy. There will always be a catalyst, like redstone, and then the actual item being infused. Iron in this case.
translation:
來做個冶金灌注機吧。 
 
這台機器讓我們能製作許多材料，之後發電或是其他機器會使用到的。 
 
黃色欄位中放入紅石，藍色欄位放入鐵錠製作富集合金。這台機器必定需要灌注的材料，像是紅石，才能真正的灌注物品。這邊我們用紅石灌注鐵。

original: A wind generator is really handy, since all you need to do to get it to work is to just place it down. \n \nPlace it high up in the sky for it to make more power!
translation: 風力發電機相當不錯，因為只需要把它放出來它就能運作。 \n \n放的位置越高能發更多電！

original:
First off, there is a better way to transfer power with mekanism, but if you don't yet have steel here's what you need to know: We'll need a way to transfer our power from our Wind Generator. 
 
Go ahead and make yourself some Energy Pipez and a Pipe Wrench. You'll need the pipe wrench to get the pipe to extract power.
 
Note: To tell the pipe to 'extract' the power, shift right click on the pipe connected to the Wind Generator.
translation:
我先說，通用機械有更好的傳電管道，但若你還沒有鋼的話，你需要知道的是：我們必須要有個方法將風力發電機產的電傳輸出來。 
 
做個能量管道和管道板手。你需要管道板手讓管道輸出能量。
 
注意：要讓管道「輸出」能量，對連接風力發電機的管道連接處蹲下右鍵。

original: All Pipez can be upgraded with pipe upgrades. This allows them to filter at higher levels. \n \nTo add the pipe upgrade, shift right click on the pipe that is currently set to extract.
translation: 所有 Pipez 模組的管道能用管道升級強化。高級管道升級能有過濾功能。 \n \n要為管道升級，對著已經是輸出模式的管道端，蹲下右鍵管道升級。

original:
The Basic Energy Cube acts as a power bank. 
 
 You can also put chargeable items on the right slot to charge them up! 
 
 That means it's time for flight!
translation:
基礎能量立方就是個電力銀行。 
 
你也能在右邊欄位處，放入可充電的物品為它充電！ 
 
意思就是該飛了吧！

original: This chargeable item can place blocks for you. \n \n To use, make sure you find the 'settings' keybind in your keybind settings, under the Building Gadget category.
translation: 這個需要電的工具能幫你放置方塊。 \n \n使用前，記得確認按鍵綁定，在建築小幫手的分類中。

original:
The Enrichment Chamber can enrich ores, like redstone or coal, to last longer inside of a metallurgic infuser. 
 
 If you want easier steel, enrich some coal to get carbon, then use carbon and an iron ingot inside of the metallurgic infuser to get enriched iron, and then use the enriched iron AGAIN with carbon to get steel. 
 
 Note: Right now, if you put in an ore you can double it by getting dust, but later on this machine can be used to make a serious ore factory.
translation:
富集倉能富集礦物，像是紅石或煤炭，讓它們在冶金灌注機中能維持得更久。 
 
若你想要更容易地取得鋼，富集一些煤炭取得富集碳，然後在冶金灌注機中放入富集碳和鐵製作富集鐵，然後把富集鐵和富集碳再次放入冶金灌注機，即可取得鋼。 
 
 注意：現在，若你放入礦物，你能兩倍化取得粉，但之後這台機器能用來打造真正的礦物處理工廠。

original:
To set up automated ore smelting from Mekanism, place the Enrichment Chamber to the left of your Iron Furnace, and place a Chest on top of both. 
 
 In the Enrichment Chamber, use the 'Side Config' settings to output to the right. Make sure to press the 'Auto Eject' button. 
 
 To get items into the Enrichment Chamber, you'll need a pipe connecting the chest on top to the machine. This can be done using an Item Pipe from &aPipez&r, or a Basic Logistical Transporter pipe from &9Mekanism&r. 
 
 In the Iron Furnace, you'll set it to Input from the left and Output to the top. Make sure to select the auto-input and output buttons.
translation:
要使用通用機械模組的方法打造自動熔煉系統，將富集倉放在鐵熔爐的左邊，並在兩者的上方放置儲物箱。 
 
點開富集倉的介面，使用「側面配置」設定物品朝右邊輸出。務必開啟「自動彈射」按鈕。 
 
要把物品輸入至富集倉，你需要使用管道，將物品從上方的儲物箱連接至富集倉。可以使用 &aPipez&r 的物品管道，或是&9通用機械&r的基礎物流管道。 
 
在鐵熔爐內，設定從左方輸入且從頂部輸出。記得開啟自動輸入與輸出按鈕。

original: To get started with Mekanism, check out the &aMekanism&r Chapter in the &6Technology&r Group.
translation: 要如何開始發展通用機械，查看&6科技模組&r底下的&a通用機械&r章節。

original:
To setup automated Ore Smelting, place your Pulverizer directly to the left of your Iron Furnace. 
 
 You'll place a chest on both, and then use the Cogwheel in the Pulverizer to configure input and output. Turn the top face Blue (input) and the right face Red (Output). Make sure to press the 'Auto Eject' and 'Auto Input' buttons. 
 
 In the Iron Furnace, you'll do the same thing, except Input from the left and Output to the top.
translation:
打造自動礦物熔煉產線，將磨粉機直接放在鐵熔爐的左邊。 
 
在兩台機器上方放置儲物箱，點開磨粉機中的齒輪圖標設定輸入輸出。將頂部面設為藍色（輸入），右側面設為紅色（輸出）。務必按下「自動輸入」和「自動輸出」按鈕。 
 
在鐵熔爐中，也需要做相同的事，不過是從左方輸入並從頂部輸出。

original: Thermal Expansion is a simple power mod! Check out the &6Thermal Series&r Chapter to get started!
translation: 熱力是個簡單的發電模組！查看&6熱力系列&r章節開始發展！

original: The Iron Furnace can be upgraded all the way to Unobtainium. \n \n It's time for an upgrade!
translation: 鐵熔爐能一直升級至難得素版本。 \n \n是時候升級了！

original: Hook the Wireless Heat Transmitter block up to your power system. Place the receiver into the transmitter to link them, then place the receiver into your furnace as fuel. \n \n This will give you wireless power for your furnace!
translation: 把無線熱能供應器接上你的電力系統。將接收器放入供應器中連接綁定，然後將接收器作為燃料放到熔爐內。 \n \n這能為熔爐提供無線的電力來源！

original: If you're on a server where the Ender Dragon is already killed, you'll need to resummon it. \n \n Take 4 End Crystals and place 1 on each side of the exit portal.
translation: 若你在伺服器上遊玩且終界龍已被擊殺，你需要重新召喚它。 \n \n準備四個終界水晶，並在終界的返回傳送門四邊上各放一個。

original: Head to the End and kill the Ender Dragon!
translation: 直搗終界並擊殺終界龍！

original: If you didn't know, there is more to the End than just killing the dragon. \n \n Once the dragon has been slain, you will find a weird 'structure' with a portal between 3 blocks. Take an Ender Pearl and throw it into the portal.
translation: 若你不知道，終界還有除了屠龍以外能做的事。 \n \n當終界龍死亡後，你會發現一個奇怪的「結構」，帶有一格夾在三個方塊內的傳送門。拿顆終界珍珠丟入傳送門。

original: Somewhere in the End, you'll find a floating ship. \n \n Defeat the enemies there and make your way to the loot room, and you'll find yourself your first Elytra.
translation: 在終界的某個地方，你會找到一艘浮空的船。 \n \n擊敗裡頭的敵人並進入寶藏室中，你將找到你的第一個鞘翅。

original: 2 waystones can be used to teleport to one another. After you eat the cake, it's gone... but you can always go back if you have a waystone setup
translation: 有兩個方法能往返終界。吃下終界蛋糕後，就沒了... 但若你有傳送石碑，就能隨時回家。

original: Throwback to the Macerator from IC2
translation: 夢迴 IC2 的磨粉機
通用機械能做到這一切！

original: Being in the void there is no end portal for you to search for, all you have to do is taste the (slightly sour) end cake and be on your merry little way!
translation: 在一片虛空當中，是沒有能讓你探索的終界傳送門的，你只需要品嘗一口終界蛋糕（微酸），就能踏上康莊大道了！

original: In case someone has already killed it...
translation: 以防萬一有人已經殺了它...

original: Sorry bud, you wanna get to the Star you gotta go through me. Me as in Chapter 2.
translation: 抱歉了捧油，想要得到那顆星你得先過我這關。就是第二章最後的那個任務。

original: We aren't using Create this time, we're using Summoning Rituals. Place down the Altar above a Nether Star Block and gather the items. Place all the items in, have a warden in the sacrifice area (check JEI), and then place the Red Matter in last. Then...
translation: 這次我們不使用動力機械的方式來製作它，改用召喚祭壇。將召喚祭壇放在地獄之星方塊之上，並準備好所需的物品。將物品放入後，弄一隻伏守者在獻祭的範圍內（查看 JEI ），最後放上紅物質。然後...

original: To make the Star you need a Warden sacrifice. To get that you need a Warden. You can get Sculk Shriekers from sieving Endstone and use a Sculk Core on them to be able to summon the Warden. \n\n (BTW the Warden Charm makes it so he can't see you or smell you)
translation: 製作那顆星你需要獻祭伏守者。因此你需要弄一隻伏守者出來。你可以篩終界石取得伏聆嘯口，然後對它使用 Sculk Core 來召喚伏守者。 \n\n （順帶一提，配戴伏守者護符，能使伏守者看不到且聞不到你。）

original: Made from a LOT of blocks
The Recipe in JEI might be buggy showing a &kwither&r Prediction but it's supposed to be the Wither Prediction.
translation: JEI 顯示的配方或許有些問題，可能會顯示為&k凋零怪&r預測產物，但它應該要顯示的是凋零怪預測產物。

original: Ars Nouveau is a magic mod based around source. It can be used for many things like spellbooks, familiars, and many other items.
translation: 新生魔藝是個基於「魔源」的魔法模組。能做到許多事情，像是法術書，使魔以及許多其他物品。

original: Botania is mod based around Mystical and Magical Flowers. The Flowers can be made to do many things but all either make or use Mana. They can go from autosmelting, to block breaking, to even redstone.
translation: 植物魔法是基於「神秘」和「魔法」花的模組。這些花能用來製作許多事情但都會需要「魔力」。能做到的事從自動熔煉，破壞方塊甚至是紅石系統。

original: Blood Magic is a mod based off of... well blood from creatures slain by you. You use this blood for Life Essence which can be used to make many items.
translation: 血魔法是個基於...「血」的模組。用這些血成為生命精華，用來製作許多物品。

original: Forbidden Arcanus is different from the other Magic mods, it's used more for Tools and Gear.
translation: 禁忌與奧秘與其他魔法模組不太一樣，最常用的是製作工具與裝備。

original: ForceCraft is another different Magic Mod, infact some might say it's not even one! This one is mostly used for the items and blocks it gives.
translation: 力量工藝是另一個不一樣的魔法模組，事實上有些人認為甚至不是魔法模組！最常用的是該模組的物品和方塊。

original: Occultism is all about using Demons for automation. Could be automating mob farming or ore duping, whatever the demons can do you make them do!
translation: 神祕學是個關於使喚「惡魔」進行自動化。能用來自動化怪物農場或礦物倍化。惡魔能做什麼，你就使喚它做什麼！

original: Reliquary is based entirely off Mob Drops. You can use these rare drops to craft usual drops, or combine them together to make unique tools and charms.
translation: 聖遺物是完全基於「生物掉落物」的模組。你能使用這些稀有的掉落物合成為不同的掉落物，或將它們組合製作獨特的工具和護符。

original: Advanced Generator Mod is for crafting custom Nuclear Reactors and Turbines.
translation: 模組化發電機是打造客製化核能反應爐與渦輪發電的模組。

original: Generators Galore is like Iron Furnaces but for power!
translation: 豐富的發電機是個類似鐵熔爐但是用來發電的模組！

original: Hostile Neural Networks (HNN) is a great mod for farming Mob Drops. You start with making Data Models then upgrading them with mob kills. Then you can put it through a Simulation to get...
translation: 敵對生物神經網路（HNN）是農生物掉落物的強大模組。製作生物的資料模型，然後擊殺該生物使其升級。然後丟到戰鬥模擬室取得...

original: Mystical Agriculture is for those who like to farm... everything.
translation: 神秘農業是為了那些喜歡種田的玩家設計的，什麼都種的那種...

original: Powah gives you unique ways of generating power at different tiers.
translation: 波瓦科技提供了獨特的發電的方式，並有不同的等級。

original: Productive Bees is for those who like to farm everything, but also like to see their farms move around and make buzzing noises.
translation: 生產蜜蜂是為了那些喜歡農作，但同時也喜歡看到農場有東西跑來跑去，並嗡嗡作響的...

original: Everything has a price and with ProjectE its EMC. Man that's a tongue twister.
translation: 每個東西都有價值，在等價交換中我們稱為 EMC。

original: A storage and logistics mod, it's easier to ask what can't AE2 do than what can it. From storage to autocrafting it's a must.
translation: 一個儲存和物流的模組，問 AE2 不能做什麼會比問 AE2 能做什麼來的容易回答。從儲存系統到自動合成，都是它必備的。

original: Create is a tech mod based off rotational power. The shafts move, the fans move, heck even the pumps move something!
translation: 動力機械是個基於「轉動能」的科技模組。傳動軸會動，風扇會動，我的天啊甚至連泵都能移動一些東西！

original: EnderIO is a logistics mod based off mobs and alloys. very helpful for those who know how the spawners work.
translation: EnderIO 是個基於「生物」和「合金」的物流模組。對於那些知道生怪磚如何工作的人相當實用。

original: Industrial Foregoing is a Machine Mod. The start consists of Rubber but in the end you'll be using a lot more than just Rubber. Be ready to make a lot of machines and don't ignore the ore drills!
translation: 工業先鋒是個機器模組。剛開始由生產乳膠，到最後你使用到的不僅是乳膠。準備好製作超多機器，但千萬別忘了礦物雷射鑽！

original: Mekanism is another Machine Mod but this one is more focused on multiblocks and lots of power. Be ready to build a Fission and Fusion Reactor and more. There's 2 pages of Mekanism and you'll probably need to go through both.
translation: 通用機械是另一個機器模組，但這個更著重於多方塊結構和大量的發電。準備好打造核分裂，核融合以及其他多方塊結構。關於通用機械的任務有兩個章節，且你應該兩章都會需要完成。

original: RFTools is less of a mod and more like a series. Lots of mods fall under it from quarries to xnet. Obviously, Quarries don't matter much here but you get the picture!
translation: RF 工具比較不像單一的模組，而是一個系列。許多模組都包含在其中，從採石場到 Xnet。顯而易見的，採石場在這個世界是無關緊要的，但至少你知道了！

original: Thermal Series is another Machine mod but it's just used for some alloy ingots. Sorry Thermal.
translation: 熱力系列是另一個機器模組，但在這裡我們只用來製作合金。抱歉了熱力模組。

original: Focus of Summoning is made through the Enchanting Apparatus. You will need Wilden Tribute which is dropped from the Wilden Chimera. To learn how to summon and fight him check quests!
translation: 召喚之核心是透過附魔裝置製作的。你會需要荒野供物，這是荒野奇美拉的掉落物。查看任務學習如何召喚並擊敗它！

original: The Gaia Spirit is a drop of the Gaia Guardian. You'll need to do the ritual with the Gaia pylons to summon and fight him. Check the book and quests to learn more.
translation: 蓋亞之魂是蓋亞守護者的掉落物。需要使用蓋亞水晶打造儀式，召喚並擊敗它。查看植物魔法辭典及任務了解更多。

original: You'll need to craft a few Acceleration Runes. To do that you'll need 4 buckets, 2 gold, a Blood Orb, Demonic Slate, and a Speed Rune.
translation: 你需要製作一些加速符文。需要四個鐵桶，兩個金錠，一個血寶珠，一個惡魔石板以及一個速度符文。

original: Deorum is a crafted Ingot, you'll need some basic Minecraft materials and Mundabitur Dust and Arcane Crystal Dust to craft it. You'll also need to craft 9 for the whole block!
translation: Deorum 是個能製作的錠，需要一些基礎的麥塊資源，潔淨粉和神秘水晶粉。你需要合成九個錠才能製作一個方塊！

original: The Heat Core is a Tier 6 Infusion item. Infusion with ForceCraft involves a few things: 1. Liquid Force 2. Power and 3. An item to Infuse and an item to Infuse with. You'll also need what determines the Tier, the Upgrade Tome. The Upgrade Tome gets Force Points from every Infusion and Tiers up from it. So get it to Tier 6 and Infuse that Heat Core!
translation: 高溫核心是等級 6 的灌注物品。力量工藝模組的灌注需要一些東西：1. 流體力量 2. 電 3. 一個灌注物品以及被灌注的物品。你也需要一本決定灌注等級，稱為升級寶典的書。升級寶典透過灌注物品取得力量點數，藉此升級。因此將它升至等級 6，並灌注出高溫核心！

original: With the Ritual of Craft Soul Gem you can make a rocketship. No, clearly it's to craft Soul Gems. A few vanilla items and a Book of Binding to Djinni and BOOM Empty Soul Gem!
translation: 靠著儀式：合成靈魂寶石，你就能製作一艘火箭飛船。才怪，是靈魂寶石。一些原版的物品和巨靈綁定之書，然後看，是靈魂寶石（空）！

original: Witherless Rose is an inventory charm that will protect you from the Withering Effect. It's made of skeleton, creeper, and slime drops along with a few Nether Stars.
translation: 不凋玫瑰是個放在身上物品欄的護符，能保護你免受凋零效果的傷害。由骷髏，苦力怕，史萊姆的掉落物，和一些地獄之星所製成。

original: The HDPC (High Density Power Capacitor) is the best you can get from Advanced Generators. It's also needed for the Star, but power is cool too!
translation: HDPC （高密度電力電容器）是你能在此模組中拿到最好的一個。它也是那顆星的必要材料，但拿來發電也很酷！

original: Generator'g Galore adds tons of Generators, but only 1 is best. Of course it's the Netherstar Generator and of course you need 2!`
translation: 豐富的發電機模組新增了大量的發電機，而只有一種最好用。當然是地獄之星發電機，然後想當然你需要兩個！

original: Not the best but still a very cool Generator!
translation: 不是最棒的但仍是相當酷的發電機！

original: Predictions are what you get from Simulating Mob deaths. They can be used in a Loot Fabricator to get the Loot of your choice. You'll need a Wither Prediction to make the Wither Compass.
translation: 預測產物是由戰鬥模擬室模擬殺怪的產物。能在戰利品製造機中使用，讓你選擇想要的掉落物。你需要凋零怪預測產物來製作凋零羅盤。（譯著：可能改過了，目前版本不需要這東西。）

original: You'll need the best seeds for Dimensional Seed. Gaia, Nether Star, Dragon, and Nitro to be exact!
translation: 你需要最棒的種子才能製作維度種子。準確的說是蓋亞，地獄之星，龍蛋，和地獄之星電晶種子！

original: Mystical Agriculture isn't just seeds, it's also what's made from those seeds. Insanium is highest normal essence can go and that can be combined with coal and make a block of Insanium Coal. While Awakened is arguably even higher! It requires Supremium to go through an Awakening Ritual (JEI).
translation: 神秘農業不只是種子，還有這些種子所製成的東西。究極精華是所有一般精華中最高階的，和煤炭合成後製作究極精華煤炭方塊。但覺醒精華可以說是更高階的！需要終極精華版的物品進行覺醒儀式。（查看 JEI）

original: The Player Transmitter, when powered, will power any items on the Player nearby. You'll need the highest tier to make the Star.
translation: 玩家發射器，當供電時，能為附近玩家身上的物品充電。你需最高等級的版本來製作那顆星。

original: Nitro Tier is the highest Tier of Powah. It's very expensive especially power wise to make. Energizing a Netherstar, 2 Redstone Blocks, and a block of Blazing Crystal with 20MFe you can get Nitro Crystals. The Nitro Battery is one of the biggest handheld sources of energy you can get.
translation: 地獄之星版是波瓦科技的最高等級。製作成本相當高，特別是相當耗電。一個地獄之星，兩個紅石方塊和一個烈焰電晶塊放入充能室中，然後給它兩千萬 FE 後，就能取得地獄之星電晶。地獄之星電池是你能帶在身上的電池中，容量最大的。

original: The Inactive Dragon Egg is made from Draconic Chunks which are made from Draconic Dust which is made from Draconic Combs. To get Draconic Combs you need Draconic Bees which come from using Dragon's breath on an Obsidian Nest in the End.
translation: 無氣息的龍蛋是由龍質片所製成的，而龍質片是由龍質粉製成，而龍質粉是由龍族蜂蜂巢製成的。要拿到龍族蜂蜂巢你需要養龍族蜂，龍族蜂是在終界對黑曜石巢使用龍之吐息引誘出來的。

original: This is basically coal to the power of 4 many many times. You need Philosopher's Stone, bunch of Coal, bunch of Diamonds, and a will to craft. Red Matter needs to be summoned in.
translation: 基本上就是 4 的很多很多次方量的煤炭。你需要賢者之石，一大堆煤炭，一大堆鑽石才能做得出來。而紅物質是由召喚祭壇中召喚的。

original: The ultimate Ring! You need 5 Red Matter and 4 other specific Rings from ProjectE: Zero Ring, Ignition Ring, Harvest Goddess Band, and Swiftwolf's Rending Gale.
translation: 這是個終極戒指！你需要五個紅物質和四個等價交換中特定的戒指：零度戒指，烈焰戒指，豐收戒指和烈風戒指。

original: Dark Matter and Feathers make a great Ring!
translation: 暗物質和羽毛做成一個很棒的戒指！

original: Dark Matter needs to be summoned in with Aeternalis Fuel as Catalyst with Netherite Scrap, Sky Steel Ingot, Enderium Ingot, and AllTheModium Ingot.
translation: 暗物質是由召喚祭壇召喚來的，需要永恆燃料方塊當催化劑，一個獄髓碎片，Sky Steel Ingot，Enderium Ingot，和 ATM 金屬錠。

original: Aeternalis Fuel Block comes from 9 Aeternalis Fuel, which is crafted from 4 Mobius Fuel, which is made of 4 Alchemical Coal, which is created by 4 Coal. 2,304 Coal to be exact!
translation: 永恆燃料方塊是由九個永恆燃料組成，永恆燃料是由四個莫比烏斯燃料製成，莫比烏斯燃料是由四個煉金煤炭製成，煉金燃料是由四個煤炭製成。準確地說你需要 2,304 個煤炭！

original: These Thermal Alloys are made in 1 of 2 ways. Dust or Induction Smelter. You can get the dust of all the items with a hammer, combine it, then smelt it. Or smelt them all together in Induction Smelter.
translation: 這些熱力的合金由兩種方式製成，粉或感應精煉爐。你能將所有材料用鎚敲成粉，組合這些粉，然後燒成錠。或直接在感應精煉爐中將材料燒成錠。

original: Xnet is a great Logistics Mod! But all we need is the Wifi, I mean Router. Craft it!
translation: Xnet 是個強大的物流模組！但我們只需要 Wifi，我的意思是路由器。做一個！

original: Module would be used in an Enviornmental Controller to give you creative flight but we just want the Star today. No flight, only Star!
translation: 這個模組需要放在環境控制器中，讓你能創造飛行。但我們現在只想要做那顆星。不飛了，一心只想做星！

original: This would be used with MekaSuit for Flight but we want the Star more. It requires Antimatter, Atomic Alloys, Nether Star, and Ultimate Induction Provider. The latter would be used with Induction Matrix to hold more Energy than the Sun but you know what we want. It's crafted with previous Induction Providers, Energy Cube, and Control Circuit.
translation: 這能用在 MekaSuit 中讓你能創造飛行，但我們更想要做那顆星。它需要反物質，原子合金，地獄之星和終極疏導供應器。終極疏導供應器能用在疏導矩陣中，讓疏導矩陣能保存比太陽還多的能量。但你知道我們要什麼。這是由前一階的疏導矩陣，與能量立方和控制電路套娃而成。

original: Basically the reward for beating Mekanism. To get it first you need Polonium which is made from the Fission Reactor. Then the Polonium gets turned into Gas form Antimatter in a SPS. Then into a Chemical Crystallizer to make Antimatter Pellet.
translation: 基本上，這是通用機械畢業的最終物品。你需要弄一套核分裂系統，將核廢料處理成釙。然後將釙輸入超臨界移相器中轉換成氣體反物質。然後將它輸入化學結晶器中製作成反物質球。

original: Industrial Foregoing has lots of machines but we want the Wither Builder. Usually used for Ether Gas but instead we're using it to make the Star. It requires a Supreme Machine Frame which funny enough needs Ether Gas.
translation: 工業先鋒有許多機器，但我們需要的是凋零生成器。通常用來幫你自動召喚凋零，但在此我們只想要做那顆星。它需要終極機械框架，有趣的是你需要乙醚氣體。

original: The Vibrant Capacitor Bank is the largest storage from EnderIo for... I don't really know what the amount is. But it requires many more Banks before it or Capacitors.
translation: Vibrant Capacitor Bank 是 EnderIo 中容量最大的電池... 能存多少窩不知道。但它需要前一階的 Banks 或電容。

original: Sentient Ender is the end goal of the EnderIO farm section. Not farming like wheat, farming like souls.
translation: 意識終界諧振器是 Ender IO 農場部分的最終目標。不是種植小麥的那種農場，這裡指的是靈魂相關的東西。

original: Again no, we are not using Create to actually build the Star this time. We do need the Mechanical Arm to make one of its parts though! It requires getting some Create machines with Deploying to make.
translation: 再次說明，這次我們不會使用動力機械的機制來製作那顆星。但我們還是需要機械臂當作那顆星的材料！它需要一些動力機械的機器，還有機械手才能製作。

original: AE2 is for storage and the highest (non-infinite) storage is the 256M. That M stands for Million, 256,000,000 estimate. It can be used to make Storage much bigger, or make the Star, your choice.
translation: AE2 是個儲存系統，而容量最大（非無限）的儲存是 256M。M 的意思是百萬，大約 256,000,000。能用來製作更大的儲存空間，或是做那顆星，你自己選擇。

original: For power of the creative universe to be obtained by the Star it needs to reach the entire universe. A Universal Terminal and Singularity should help that! The Terminal can be crafted from other Terminals but the Singularity is different. Using a Matter Condenser you can Condense Storage Components in hopes of it being a Singularity. The Storage Components may need to be full though...
translation: 為了讓那顆星取得無盡的宇宙之力，它必須更靠近整個宇宙。通用終端機和奇點應該有幫助！終端機能由其他終端機組合而成，但奇點不一樣。使用物質聚合器並放入儲存元件，然後祈禱他變成奇點。但儲存元件可能需要灌滿東西，所以...

original: Make an infinitely dense and small item, even smaller and denser?
translation: 做一個體積無限小，然後更小，更緊湊的東西？

original: If you want good gear you're gonna need Apotheosis Affixes, and that all starts with a Gem.
translation: 若你想要弄一套好裝備，你絕對需要神化詞綴，而這一切的開始就是寶石。

original: To get Gem Dust you need an Apotheosis Gem and an anvil. Any Apotheosis Gem (Recommended only common and uncommon). Once you get your gems smash them with a falling anvil! Then to make this easier make a Salvaging Table.
translation: 要取得寶石粉你需要一個神化寶石和一個鐵砧。任何的神化寶石（建議只用普通的和罕見的）。只要先將寶石用掉落的鐵砧砸碎，之後就能用分解台簡單的製作！

original: You got tools and Gems so how do we combine them? First, make sure your tool has an open Socket. (For more on Sockets check the Vials and Sigils section). If one is open, you can combine your tool and Gem in a Smithing Table. If you aren't happy with your current Gems then you might need a...
translation: 你有工具和寶石了，但我們要怎麼將它們組合在一起？首先，先確認你的工具有插槽。（想要有更多插槽請參閱咒符與試劑的任務。）若有空的插槽，你能在鍛造台中終將工具和寶石組合在一起。若你對現有的寶石不甚滿意的話，你需要...

original: Gem Cutting Table! To change the Rarity of your Gem you'll need to use this table. By using 2 of the same Gem and Rarity Materials you can increase your Gems rarity and that increases its power.
translation: 寶石切割台！要改變寶石的稀有度，必須使用這個切割台。使用兩個相同的寶石，和一些稀有的材料，你能提升寶石的稀有度，意思是更強的寶石。

original: The better the Gem, the better the stats! Flawless is second best while Perfect is the best.
translation: 更好的寶石，更好的素質！無瑕的寶石是第二好的，而完美的寶石是最好的。

original: Affixed Weapons can be found plenty of ways but how do I know what's Affixed? Affixed Weapons will always have super long names usually with the type of weapon and name of who may have previously owned it. It will also be colored the Rarity it is, green for uncommon blue for rare and so on. It will also have bonus stats or atleast Enchantability increase.
translation: 詞綴武器有多種取得的方式，但我要怎麼知道什麼東西有詞綴？詞綴武器總是有個超長的名稱，通常會有武器的種類，以及前一個持有者的名字。物品名稱也會顯示稀有度的顏色，綠色是罕見的，藍色是稀有的等等。同時會有額外的素質加成，或至少增加可附魔的等級。

original: Mythical Affixes are the best stats you can get so Mythical Weapons are what you want to aim for. Good luck getting one!
translation: 神話詞綴是你能拿到最棒的，因此神話詞綴武器會是你想要瞄準的武器。搞一把來吧，祝你好運！

original: Vials and Sigils are items used to change your weapons sockets, whether to add more or free them up. All are used with your item in a Smithing Table.
translation: 咒符與試劑是用來改變武器插槽的物品，無論是增加插槽或是將寶石取出。都需要在鍛造台中操作。

original: To those new to Apotheosis sockets are confusing and irritating. Your weapons and armor need sockets to use Gems with it. But what if it doesn't have a socket? Then you'll need a Sigil of Socketing! Combine your item and Sigil in a Smithing Table and boom you can get up to 3 sockets.
translation: 給那些對神化插槽感到困擾的新手。你的武器和裝備需要插槽才能安裝寶石。但如果它沒有插槽呢？那麼你需要寶石鑲嵌符咒！將你的物品和符咒放入鍛造台中，然後你就能有最多三個插槽。

original: The Superior Sigil of Socketing does exactly what its inferior version does but up to 4 sockets instead of 3.
translation: 卓越的寶石鑲嵌符咒和前一個能做得到事情相同，但它最多能有四個插槽而不只三個。

original: Vial of Unnaming does as it suggests. When you have an affixed item with an awkwardly long name, you can combine it with the vial in a smithing table to get rid of most of the name. (Only the material and weapon type as with the rarity color will stay).
translation: 除名試劑跟你想的一樣。當你的詞綴物品有長到令人作嘔的名稱時，將它和試劑放入鍛造台中，把大部分的名稱刪除。（只會保留物品材料，種類和稀有度的顏色。）

original: The Vial of (Arcane) Extration does the opposite of the Vial of Explusion, instead of breaking the Gem it breaks the Item and you can keep the Gem.
translation: 奧術提取劑和熾炎驅逐劑功能完全相反，它會破壞物品保留寶石，而非破壞寶石。

original: The Vial of (Searing) Explusion can be used in a Smithing Table to take a Gem out of the Socket of an item. Warning this will break the Gem and just open a Socket.
translation: 熾炎驅逐劑能在鍛造台中使用，將寶石從物品中取出。注意這將破壞寶石只保留物品。

original: The Salvaging Table can finally get you materials and Gem Dust without using Anvils. You can recycle tools and armor with affixes to get their materials. And break down horse armor for some reason.
translation: 分解台終於能讓你不用使用鐵砧，取得材料和寶石粉。你能將那些用不到的詞綴工具裝備重複利用，變為相對應的材料。普通的馬鎧也能分解。

original: The Simple Reforging Table is used like an Enchantment Table but with Affixes. With Gem Dust, Rarity Materials, and an Affixed Item you can reroll the affixes for a cost of EXP. This can also be used to change the Rarity of the Affixed item up to Rare
translation: 簡易重鑄台類似附魔台，只是它是用來附詞綴。使用寶石粉，稀有材料和詞綴物品，就能消耗經驗來洗詞綴。這能改變物品的詞綴稀有度，提升至罕見。

original: The Reforging Table does everything a Simple one does but better, it can do Epic and Mythic Affixes!
translation: 重鑄台和前一個東西一模一樣，但它能改變物品詞綴稀有度至史詩和神話！

original: Silent Gear Weapons, Tools, and Armor
translation: 寂靜裝備的武器、工具和盔甲
一階星光充能儀催化劑
二階星光充能儀催化劑
三階星光充能儀催化劑

original:
Silent Gear is a tool and armor mod that makes crafting gear easy. 
 
 Each gear piece is customizable, allowing you to upgrade it with special traits or repair it on the go! 
 
 You can also convert vanilla tools like an iron pickaxe to a Silent Gear pickaxe by putting it into a crafting table!
translation:
寂靜裝備是個有關工具和裝備的模組，能夠為製作套裝增添樂趣。

工具和裝備的每個部件都是能夠客製化的，不僅能夠重複修復，還能透過升級添加各種特性。

你可以將原版工具放進合成台裡，將其轉換成寂靜裝備的工具。

original:
To get started with gear crafting in the early game, we'll need to make some &9Template Boards&r to create our first &eTemplate&r. 
 
 Templates are single-use 'blueprints' for creating tool parts. Using the basic boards, craft yourself a &aPickaxe Template&r. 
 
 If you combine the Pickaxe Template with 3 of most materials*, you can create a Pickaxe Head part. 
 
 *Note: Material must have a Silent Gear Material tooltip with the Main type.
translation:
要在遊戲前期做出寂靜裝備的工具，我們會需要做一些&9模具基板&r來製作&e模具&r。

模具是一次性使用的「藍圖」，用來製作工具部件。試著用基板來製作一個 &a鎬模具&r。

再拿鎬模具和三個材料合成，就能夠做出鎬頭部件。

註：材料必須為寂靜裝備材料中的主要材料（在物品提示查看）

original:
To make your first tool, take your Pickaxe Head part and put it into the crafting table. 
 
 To create a full pickaxe, you can either add a stick to the crafting table, or create your own custom handle using a &9Tool Rod Template&r instead of using a stick. 
 
 *Note: You can always search up the templates and then press U on it, then navigate to the 'Gear Crafting' tab. This will show you how to make gear parts.
translation:
要製作第一件工具，請將十字鎬頭部件放入製作台。

 要製作一把完整的鎬，您可以在合成台上添加一根棍子，或者使用 &9工具桿模板&r 創建自己的自定義手柄，而不是使用棍子。
 
 *注：您可以隨時搜索模板，然後按 U 鍵，進入 "裝備製作 "選項卡。這將告訴你如何製作齒輪部件。

original: You can't use template boards forever!!! \n \n Blueprint paper is used to make blueprints, which are reusable, unlike template boards.
translation: 你不能永遠都在用模板！！！\n \n 藍圖紙用於製作藍圖，與模板不同，藍圖紙可以重複使用。

original: The tip upgrade is used to increase the mining level of the tool. \n \n For example: If you have an iron pickaxe with 1 diamond, you can make a Diamond Tip Upgrade, and place it on your pickaxe. This will allow it to mine obsidian, as well as give it a stat boost.
translation: 尖端升級用於提高工具的採礦等級。\n \n 舉個例子： 如果您有一把鑲有 1 顆鑽石的鐵鎬，您可以製作鑽石鎬尖升級版，並將其安裝在鐵鎬上。這樣它就能開採黑曜石，同時還能提升屬性。

original: Coats an item or tool. \n \n Netherite makes a great coating material.
translation: 對物品或工具進行塗層。\n \n 獄髓是一種很好的塗層材料。

original: Everyone loves the sword. \n \n With this blueprint, you can make the basic sword! Reliable damage, reliable speed.
translation: 每個人都喜歡劍。\n \n 有了這個藍圖，你就可以製作基本的劍！可靠的傷害，可靠的速度。

original: Low damage, very high attack speed. Reduces the invincibility time of the target.
translation: 傷害低，攻擊速度極快。減少目標的無敵時間。

original: More damage than a sword, but slower.
translation: 傷害比劍高，但速度較慢。

original: Slightly faster than a sword, but lower damage.
translation: 速度略快於劍，但傷害較低。

original: Less damage than a sword, but longer reach.
translation: 傷害比劍低，但範圍更遠。

original: Higher Durability than a dagger, but lower damage and speed.
translation: 耐久度比匕首高，但傷害和速度較低。

original:
Silent Gear items can be repaired using a &9Repair Kit&r. 
 
 To repair an item, place the Repair Kit into a crafting table, then place the materials needed to repair the tool inside the table with it. This will 'fill' the Repair Kit. 
 
 To repair the tool, combine the filled Repair Kit with the tool you'd like to repair in a crafting grid.
translation:
Slient Gear 裝備物品可以使用 &9修理包&r 進行修復。
 
 要修理物品，先將修理包放入合成台，然後將修理工具所需的材料一起放入合成台。這將 "填充 "修理工具包。
 
 要修復工具，請將裝滿的修理包和要修覆的工具放入合成欄位中。

original:
Placing an ingot in this with a Grader Catalyst will give the material a grade. 
 
 The better the grade, the better the stats are on the material. 
 
 The best grade is MAX.
translation:
將鋼錠與分級器催化劑(Grader Catalyst)一起放入其中，就能給材料分級。
 
 等級越高，材料的屬性越好。
 
 最好的等級是 MAX。

original: This is used to create custom alloys. \n \n It is also the only way to get Tyrian Steel!
translation: 用於製造自訂合金。\n \n 這也是獲得提爾鋼錠的唯一途徑！

original:
The Starlight Charger can 'enchant' materials with the 'Star Charged' enchantment. 
 
 A structure must be built with the Starlight Charger in the middle in view of the night sky. It only gains Starlight Power during the night. 
 
 The Charger must be placed in the middle of a 7x7 structure, with a Pillar in each corner. Each pillar must have a 'Starlight Charger Cap'. 
 
 It also requires a charger catalyst per material.
translation:
星光充能器可以用 "星光充能(Star Charged)附魔 "對材料進行 "附魔"。
 
 建造建築時，必須將星光充電器置於夜空之中。它只能在夜間獲得星光能量。
 
 充電器必須放在一個 7x7 建築的中間，每個角落都有一個支柱。每個支柱都必須有一個 "星光充電器帽"。
 
 每個材料還需要一個充電器催化劑。

original: This is a Tier 1 Pillar Cap for the Starlight Charger structure.
translation: 這是星光充電器結構的一級柱帽。

original: This is a Tier 2 Pillar Cap for the Starlight Charger structure.
translation: 這是星光充電器結構的二級柱帽。

original: This is a Tier 3 Pillar Cap for the Starlight Charger structure.
translation: 這是星光充電器結構的三級柱帽。

original: Or At Least How To Make It
For when you didn't find 3 diamonds.
translation: 用於當你找不到 3 顆鑽石時。

original: Breaks down items into their components.
translation: 將物品分解為各個組成部分。

original: Welcome to Mahou Tsukai. No, you can't instantly get the Morgan sword you'll need to actually play the mod a little. To start take some damage. You'll have a bleeding effect. before it fades, hold shift and press M on a solid block to place your first mahou circle.
translation: 歡迎來到魔法使模組。不，你無法立刻獲得這個模組的摩根劍，至少要遊玩一下這個模組才行。受到傷害之後，你會得到流血的效果。在那消失之前，按住 shift 並在實體方塊上按 M 鍵來放置你第一個魔法圈。

original: Hold a Shield in your off hand and the Scroll of Strengthening in your main and hold right click.
translation: 將一個盾牌放在副手，強化卷軸放在主手並按住右鍵。

original: Welcome to the Basic Storage Chapter! \n \n You'll find all of the basic ways to store items without power, as well as useful items for your storage needs!
translation: 歡迎來到基本儲存章節！ \n \n在這裡會介紹一些不需要耗電的基礎儲存方式，同時也會介紹一些儲存相關的實用物品！

original: A way to destroy unwanted items, liquid, and power.
translation: 一種銷毀不想要的物品，流體和電力的方式。

original:
Looking to create virtual storage using &9Refined Storage&r or &9Applied Energistics 2&r? 
 
 These are both great ways to upgrade your storage, but it is important to talk about &eNBT Items&r and the best way to store them. 
 
 NBT items are items with extra tags attached to them. Enchanted items, items with durability, Apotheosis gems... these are all items with NBT tags attached to them. Because of this, they don't usually stack. 
 
 When you store a lot of these into a storage system like RS or AE2, you run the chance of creating issues for your save or server. 
 
 Because of this, it is best to store them in chests or bags!
translation:
想要使用&9精緻儲存&r或&9應用能源 2&r的數位儲存方案嗎？ 
 
這兩者都是不錯的儲存方案，但告訴你關於 &eNBT 物品&r的知識是更重要的。 
 
NBT 物品是指有額外標籤標記的物品。像是附魔物品，有耐久的物品，神化寶石...，這些都是有額外 NBT 的物品。也因為這樣，它們通常不能堆疊。 
 
當你將大量的這些物品存在 RS 或 AE2 時，你的存檔或伺服器檔案可能會遇到一些問題。 
 
正因如此，最好是將這類物品存在儲物箱或背包裡！

original:
Chests that work across dimensions. 
 
 Can be color coded for security! (Right click on the block with the desired dye). 
 
 *Note: If someone else uses your color combination, they can get the contents!
translation:
能跨維度存取的儲物箱。 
 
為了安全性能上色碼！（拿染料對它右鍵。） 
 
注意：若同時有人使用相同的色碼，他們也能存取內容物！

original: Functional Storage is a mod for storing stacks of the same items. \n \n This is useful for items like Cobblestone, Dirt, etc.
translation: 功能性儲存是個保存大量相同物品的模組。 \n \n用來存放鵝卵石，泥土之類的相當實用。

original: Craft yourself a 1x1 drawer. This item holds a ton of stacks of 1 item.
translation: 製作你第一個 1x1 的抽屜。這能存放好幾組的單一物品。

original:
Used to link Drawers to a controller and to link up Ender Drawers. 
 
 To link Drawers to the Controller, right click the Controller block to start configuration. Right clicking Drawers will add them to the network. 
 
 Holding the tool will show you what Drawers are connected to the Controller.
translation:
用來將抽屜連結至控制器，或是將終界抽屜連結在一起。 
 
要連接控制器，先拿它對控制器右鍵設定。然後在對想要連結的抽屜，右鍵新增至整個控制器網路。 
 
手持連結工具會顯示那些抽屜已經連結上控制器。

original: The Configuration Tool is used to lock drawers for them to remember the item it has inside. \n \n This is useful whenever you set up a system to pull and push from drawers. The locked drawer will not replace the item that was locked on it!
translation: 設定工具是用來將抽屜上鎖，讓它記住已存入的物品。 \n \n無論是由抽屜系統取出或存入物品都相當實用。已上鎖的抽屜不會被其他物品取代存放！

original:
Using a &aLinking Tool&r, you can link 2 Ender Drawers to sync up the contents. 
 
 This works just like an Ender Chest, but for Drawers. 
 
 To link, Right click the first Ender Drawer with the &aLinking Tool&r, then left click the second Ender Drawer to sync.
translation:
使用&a連結工具&r，你能連結兩個終界抽屜使它們同步內容物。 
 
和終界箱的功能一樣，但這是抽屜。 
 
連結時，先拿著&a連結工具&r對第一個終界抽屜右鍵，然後對第二個終界抽屜左鍵使兩者同步。

original: When placed and connected with the &aLinking Tool&r to other drawers, this block acts as a 'Hub.' \n \n If you double right-click this, all items within the Storage Drawers 'Network' will be pulled from your inventory.
translation: 放置並使用&a連結工具&r將其他抽屜連結在一起後，這個控制器就是一個「中心」。 \n \n若你右鍵雙擊它，身上所有的物品，都會存入所有連結該控制器的「網路」。

original: This item can convert items placed inside to their nugget or block forms. \n \n For example: An Iron Ingot placed in this will allow you to pull out 9 nuggets, or if more iron is placed in, will covert it to Iron Blocks.
translation: 這個抽屜能將存入的物品轉換成相對應的粒或方塊形式。 \n \n舉例來說：放入一個鐵錠時，你可以取出 9 個鐵粒，或放入更多鐵錠時，它會轉換成鐵方塊。

original: Sophisticated Chests allows you to upgrade your chests with metals to increase storage! You can also add upgrade filters to increase the functionality of the chest. \n \n No more vanilla double-chest rooms!
translation: 精巧儲物箱讓你能升級儲物箱來增加更多儲物空間！你也能放入升級來增加該儲物箱的功能性。 \n \n不要再用原版的大箱子了！

original: Just like a vanilla chest, but has a slot for a Storage Upgrade!
translation: 和原版儲物箱一樣的空間，但多一個欄位能放升級！

original: *Note: To upgrade an already placed vanilla chest to an Iron Sophisticated Chest, you will first need to convert the chest with a 'Basic Tier Upgrade.'
translation: 注意：若要升級一個已經放滿東西的原版儲物箱，你必須先對這個箱子使用「基礎升級」。

original: Even MORE slots for storage and upgrades.
translation: 有更多的儲物空間與升級欄位。

original: To save you from having this &oentire quest section&r covered with filter upgrades, take a look at the Sophisticated Backpack upgrades. \n \n You'll need to make the Sophisticated Storage equivalent, but they function about the same.
translation: 為了避免&o整章任務&r都是升級的東西，相同的升級在精巧背包中也都有。 \n \n你只需要做精巧背包的升級就好，但基本上功能是相同的。

original: Sophisticated Backpacks offer upgradable backpacks that can also use filters to add nifty features!
translation: 精巧背包提供了可升級的背包，也能使用升級增加一些有趣的特性！

original: You will need these to make backpack filter upgrades.
translation: 你需要這個才能製作其他各種的升級。
受夠這些多餘的東西了
跨維度的抽屜...如果你想要的話。

original: A single chest the size of 2.
A lot more room for activities.

translation: 更更更多空間做更多事！

original: Adds the ability to pump liquids from the tank upgrade.
translation: 為儲罐升級新增泵浦功能。

original: Increases stack size in the backpack.
translation: 增加背包內物品能堆疊的大小。

original: Adds a tank to the backpack.
translation: 為背包增加儲罐的功能。

original: Adds a battery to the backpack.
translation: 為背包增加電池的功能。

original: Adds a Stonecutting GUI to the backpack.
translation: 在背包中增加切石機的介面。

original: Keeps the player's inventory stacked up from items in the backpack.
translation: 為玩家身上永遠保持一組背包內的物品。

original: I heard you like backpacks in your backpacks.
translation: 聽你喜歡在背包裡面放背包。

original: Adds a Crafting Table GUI to the backpack.
translation: 在背包中增加工作台的介面。

original: Allows the backpack to pick up items.
translation: 使背包能自動拾取物品。

original: Allows the backpack to be emptied.
Adds a filter for items being pumped in or out of the backpack.
Auto-feed with food in the backpack.
translation: 用背包內的食物自動餵食玩家。

original: Compacts items in the backpack to their 2x2 recipe.
translation: 將背包內的物品以 2x2 的配方打包。

original: Compacts items in the backpack to their 3x3 recipe.
translation: 將背包內的物品以 3x3 的配方打包。

original: Adds a smoker GUI to the backpack.
translation: 在背包中增加煙燻爐的介面。

original: Adds a blasting GUI to the backpack.
translation: 在背包中增加高爐的介面。

original: Adds a Smelting Tab to Backpack
translation: 在背包中增加鍛造台的介面。

original: Auto-Swap to the tool that is most effective for the block you are looking at.
translation: 依據你看到的方塊自動切換最有效破壞的工具。

original: Adds a filter for items you want to auto-delete in the backpack.
translation: 在背包增加一個篩選選項過濾你想自動刪除的物品。
自動熔煉背包內的物品。
製作你第一個儲存單元

original:
&lWelcome to &bApplied Energistics 2&f! 
 
 Applied Energistics 2 (or &oAE2&r for short) is an incredibly versatile &bdigital storage&f mod, allowing for extremely efficient storage and all sorts of automation capabilities to greatly augment your modded Minecraft experience from as early as you want to the very endgame. 
 
 To get started with AE2, you will need to sieve for an important resource for the mod known as &bCertus Quartz&f. 
 
 For more information on AE2 beyond this chapter, consult the wiki over at
translation:
&l歡迎來到&b應用能源 2&f！ 
 
應用能源 2（或簡稱&oAE2&r），是個難以置信全能的&b數位儲存&f模組，使你能極度有效的儲存與自動化的各種工作，大幅改進麥塊模組的遊戲體驗，從遊戲初期至遊戲大後期都是。 
 
開始發展 AE2 前，你必須篩出該模組的一個重要資源，叫做&b賽特斯石英&f。 
 
關於這章沒提到的更多 AE2 資訊，請參閱

original: The &bQuartz Wrench&f does what any regular tech mod wrench would do. It rotates blocks and devices along the face you right-click on and dismantles them when right-clicked while sneaking. \n \n AE2's wrench comes in both certus and nether quartz flavours.
translation: &b石英扳手&f的功能與一般科技模組的扳手相同。右鍵點擊可以旋轉方塊和機器，而在潛行狀態下右鍵點擊可以拆解它們。\n\nAE2 的扳手有賽特斯石英和地獄石英兩種版本。

original:
Two of the very first things you will need to get started in AE2 are the &bCharger&f and the &bInscriber&f. 
 
 The &bCharger&f, when supplied with power, will take &eCertus Quartz Crystals&r and charge them. These &eCharged Certus Crystals&r can then be used in the production of &eFluix&f, another important resource in the mod. It can also be used to charge any item that stores power. 
 
 The &bInscriber&f can be used to turn the various quartz crystals in AE2 into their dust form, but more importantly is used to fabricate special &ePrinted Circuits&f and &eProcessors&f, as will become clearer in the next quest.
translation:
要開始發展 AE2 中，你首先要取得的兩樣物品是&b充能器&f和&b壓印機&f。

當你給&b充能器&f供應電力時，它可以將&e賽特斯石英水晶&r充能。這些&e充能賽特斯石英水晶&r可以用來製造&e福魯伊克斯&f，這是模組中的另一種重要資源。&b充能器&f還可以給任何能儲存電力的物品充電。

&b壓印機&f可以將 AE2 中的各種石英水晶變為粉末形態，但更重要的是，它可以製造特殊的&e印刷電路板&f和&e處理器&f，這將在下一個任務中詳細介紹。

original: While the Inscriber and Charger will natively accept RF/FE, the vast majority of an ME network uses its own dedicated power system called AE. \n \n RF/FE can be converted into the native AE at a ratio of 2:1 RF:AE, either directly through an ME Controller, or through the &bEnergy Acceptor&f, which can instead be connected to any part of the network.
translation: 雖然壓印機和充能器可以直接接受 RF/FE 電力，但大多數 ME 網路使用的是它自己的專用電力系統，稱為 AE。\n \nRF/FE 可以以 2：1 的比例轉換為 AE，AE 可以直接通過 ME 控制器進行轉換，或者利用&b能源接受器&f，後者可以連接在網路的任何部分。

original: By default, an ME network on its own only has an internal buffer of 800AE without an ME Controller, with the controller adding an extra 8kAE per block. For large enough networks, this can be insufficient and may cause a network to power off intermittently when trying to recoup power for any connected devices. \n \n The &bEnergy Cell&f allows for an ME network to hold significantly more energy, adding another 200kAE per regular Energy Cell and 1.6MAE per &bDense&f Energy Cell. These can also be placed anywhere in the network to provide the increased energy buffer.
translation: 預設情況下，沒有 ME 控制器的 ME 網路，其內部儲能量僅有 8 百 AE，而每個控制器方塊會額外增加 8 千 AE。對較大的網路來說，這可能會不太夠，並且在嘗試為任何連接的機器恢復供能時，可能會導致網路斷電。\n\n&b能量電池&f可以讓 ME 網路儲存更多的能量，一顆普通的能量電池能儲存 20 萬 AE，而一顆&b緻密能量電池&f能儲存 160 萬 AE。這些電池也可以放置在網路中的任何位置，以增加網路的儲能量。

original: The &bEnergy Card&f can be applied to most chargeable devices like Portable Cells and Wireless Terminals (covered later) to also increase &otheir&r energy buffer.
translation: &b能量卡&f可以用在大多數可充電的設備上，如之後會介紹的攜帶式單元和無線終端機，以增加它們的儲能量。

original:
Since we're missing the floor, finding where meteorites land is gonna be a little too hard so instead we've replaced them! 

 Instead of finding Inscriber Press you can now craft them with an Inscriber. You'll need skystone dust for crafting them which we can get from sieving Dust. 

 Don't worry they are still used the same as if ATM9 had floor.
translation:
因為我們現在在天際中，想要找到隕石會變得非常困難，所以我們改用其他方式來代替！

你現在不需要尋找壓印模板，而是要利用壓印機來製作。你需要用到隕石粉來製作這些壓印模板，這些隕石粉可以通過篩塵土來取得。

別擔心，這些壓印模板的使用方式和 ATM9 在地表時是一樣的。

original: Once you have obtained a full set of the required &eInscriber Presses&r, it's time to start making some &eProcessors&f. These are an important crafting ingredient used to make the large majority of ME-connected devices.
translation: 一旦你獲得了需要的一整組&e壓印模板&r，就可以開始製作一些&e處理器&f了。這些處理器是製作大多數 ME 網路設備的重要材料。

original: &eTerminals&f provide access to any of the contents of an ME network. The standard &eME Terminal&f simply lists everything in the network as one large grid to pull from and insert into, akin to a single inventory. \n \n The &eME Crafting Terminal&f is an extension of the ME Terminal which also provides a built-in crafting grid, allowing for convenient crafting using any item contained in the network and visible through the terminal screen.
translation: &e終端機&f提供存取 ME 網路中任何內容的功能。普通的&eME 終端機&f會將網路中的所有物品以大型網格的形式列出，方便放入和取出，就像一個物品欄。\n\n&eME 合成終端機&f是 ME 終端機的延伸，它還提供內建的合成方格，可以方便地使用網路中任何可見的物品進行合成。

original: The &bNetwork Tool&f is an important tool throughout AE2, which is used to display various details of a network on-screen such as overall power consumption and storage. \n \n As an added bonus, it also provides its own small inventory used to hold &eupgrade cards&f, which can be accessed when looking at any upgradeable device's screen for easy replacement. However, it cannot rotate blocks attached to the ME network like a regular wrench, only dismantle them when sneaking.
translation: &b網路工具&f是 AE2 裡的重要工具，用於在畫面上顯示 ME 網路的各種詳細資訊，如總體電力消耗量和儲能量。\n\n額外的好處是，它還提供一個小型的物品欄，用於存放&e升級卡&f，在查看任何可升級機器的介面時可以方便地替換升級卡。然而，它無法像普通扳手一樣旋轉連接到 ME 網路的方塊，只能在潛行狀態下拆解它們。

original: Arguably the most important resource you will need next is &eFluix&f, used throughout the vast majority of AE2 devices and serving as a base for crafting all of the cabling within an ME network. \n \n You'll typically want to mass produce these, and the way to do so is to make a &bFluix Crystal&f by throwing &eNether Quartz&f, &e&oCharged&r&e Certus quartz&r and &eRedstone&f together in a pool of water. This will give you a &eFluix Crystal&r which you can turn to dust in an Inscriber.
translation: 接下來，你可能最需要的資源是&e福魯伊克斯&f，它在合成絕大多數 AE2 裝置時都會用到，並作為合成 ME 網路內所有線纜的基礎。\n\n通常你會想要大規模生產福魯伊克斯，製作方法是將&e地獄石英&f、&e&o充能&r&e賽特斯石英&r和&e紅石&f一起丟入水池中。這樣就會得到一顆&e福魯伊克斯水晶&f，然後你可以用壓印機把它壓成粉。

original:
To connect the vast majority of your ME network together, you will need some cable. &eME Glass Cable&f is the first and most basic kind of cable, and you'll be making this all throughout as the first step towards crafting the other kinds of cable. 
 
 Both glass cables and their &ecovered&f counterpart can carry up to 8 channels along a single section of cabling. Unlike glass cables, covered cables can subsequently be crafted into &edense&f covered cables, capable of carrying up to 32 channels. However, most 'multipart' devices such as buses and terminals cannot be directly attached to dense cables, requiring normal-width cables to form a connection instead. 
 
 All cables can also be crafted with dye to colour them. Uncoloured ('Fluix') cables can connect to any other colour of cable, but otherwise differently-coloured cables will never connect to one another.
translation:
要把你的 ME 網路連接起來時，會需要一些線纜。&eME玻璃線纜&f是最基本的一種線纜，並且要使用它來合成其他種類的線纜。

玻璃線纜及其&e包覆&f的版本每段線纜可以擁有多達 8 個頻道。不同於玻璃線纜，包覆線纜可以進一步合成成&e緻密&f包覆線纜，能夠擁有多達 32 個頻道。然而，大多數的「multipart」設備，如匯流排和終端機，無法直接放在緻密線纜上，而是需要使用普通寬度的線纜來連接。

所有線纜也可以用染料進行染色。未染色的（「福魯伊克斯」）線纜會與任何其他顏色的線纜連接，但不同顏色的線纜則不會互相連接。

original:
The &bQuartz Cutting Knife&f, like the wrench, comes in both nether and certus quartz flavours and is a useful crafting tool to have on hand. 
 
 Cables can also be separated without needing to be coloured by attaching a &bCable Anchor&f between them, crafted using this knife and craftable up to 50 times with the same knife before it breaks. 
 
 Cable Anchors can also be used to craft &bCable Facades&f, allowing you to disguise cables within walls by covering them with the face of an arbitrary block. While facade recipes are hidden in JEI, you can still craft them by taking any regular block and surrounding it with 4 cable anchors in the crafting grid. 
 
 Aside from crafting anchors, the cutting knife also has another use: right-clicking with the knife will open a small GUI that allows you to craft &bInscriber Name Presses&f. When given a name, these presses can be used inside of an Inscriber to rename any input item with the name of the press. Two of these presses can be concatenated in the inscriber to rename the item to the name of the top press, followed by the bottom one.
translation:
&b石英切割刀&f和扳手一樣，有地獄石英和賽特斯石英兩種版本，是一個非常有用的合成工具。

&b線纜錨&f可以將線纜分離，而無需將線纜染色，這個錨是使用切割刀來製作的，同一把刀最多可以製作50個錨，之後刀子會損壞。

&b線纜錨&f還可以用來製作&b線纜偽裝板&f，讓你用任意方塊的表面來隱藏線纜。雖然偽裝板的配方在JEI中是隱藏的，但你依然可以將任意方塊放置在合成方格中，並用4個線纜錨包圍它來製作偽裝板。

除了製作線纜錨，這把切割刀還有另一個用途：右鍵刀子會打開一個小型介面，允許你製作&b命名壓印模板&f。給予名稱後，這些模板可以在壓印機內使用，將輸入的物品重新命名為模板的名稱。兩個這些模板可以在壓印機中連接起來，將物品重新命名為頂部模板的名稱，並接著底部模板的名稱。

original: The &bME Smart Cable&f and &bDense Smart Cable&f function identically to the covered cables in terms of channel distribution, but will also visibly display the amount of channels they are using as coloured lines along themselves.
translation: &bME 智慧線纜&f和&b緻密智慧線纜&f在分配頻道的功能上與包覆線纜相同，但會利用彩色線條來顯示正在使用的頻道數。

original: Each individual cell has a certain capacity dictated by the &ecomponent&f that the cell has been crafted with. \n \n The first of the components is the &b1k ME Storage Component&f, providing &e1024&f 'bytes' of storage for a given cell. More on that later.
translation: 每個獨立的單元都會擁有一定的容量，由製作單元所用的元件決定。\n\n第一個元件是 &b1k ME 儲存元件&f，為單元提供 &e1024&f “位元組”儲存空間。稍後會詳細介紹。

original: The second tier of storage component, providing &e4096&f bytes of storage.
translation: 第二層儲存元件，提供 &e4096&f 位元組的儲存空間。

original: The third tier of storage component, providing &e16384&f bytes of storage.
translation: 第三層儲存元件，提供 &e16384&f 位元組的儲存空間。

original: The fourth tier of storage component, providing &e65536&f bytes of storage.
translation: 第四層儲存元件，提供 &e65536&f 位元組的儲存。

original: The fifth and final AE2-standard tier of storage component, providing &e262144&f bytes of storage.
translation: 第五層也是最後一層 AE2 標準儲存元件，提供 &e262144&f 位元組的儲存。

original: The third MEGA tier of storage component, providing &e16777216&f (16384k) bytes of storage.
translation: 第三層 MEGA 儲存元件，提供 &e16777216&f (16384k) 位元組的儲存。

original: Apotheosis is quite a big mod so I'm dividing it in 3 quests chapters. The Enchanting and Affixes will be separate. This one is for normal game changes.
translation: 神化是一個相當大的模組，所以我將其分為三個任務章節。附魔和詞綴將會分開。這個章節是針對原版遊戲的變更。

original: Apotheosis adds some small changes to Minecraft, don't worry all are good and helpful!
translation: 《神化》模組在原版遊戲中增加了一些小變動，別擔心，這些變動都是有益且有幫助的！

original: Some of the items changed with Apotheosis is Enchantments for Anvils and Shears. Shears can now use the normal enchants but now including fortune and new enchants. Shears can get Growth Serum, Chromatic Aberation, and Workers Explotiation. You can discover what they do yourself. The Anvils can now be enchanted with Unbreaking and new enchants as well! Splitting and Obleritation. Both are used on the anvil then use the Enchanted Anvil to drop it on an Enchanted Book.
translation: 《神化》模組對一些物品進行了改動，像是鐵砧和剪刀的附魔。剪刀現在可以使用原版的附魔，包括幸運及新增的附魔。剪刀可以附上生長血清、染色、剝削等附魔。你可以自行查找這些附魔的功能。鐵砧現在可以附上耐久及新增的附魔，像是拆分和分裂。這兩個附魔可以附在鐵砧上然後使用附魔過的鐵砧掉落砸在附魔書上

original: You ever get bored of the 'normal' heights for cacti, bamboo, and sugarcane? You ever wish to see skyscrapers of Bamboo? Apotheosis can bring you your croppy Skyscrapers! Now height limits for Cacti, Bamboo, and Sugarcane have been increased! To how much? IDK, how tall is world height limit?
translation: 你是否厭倦了仙人掌、竹子和甘蔗的‘原版’高度？你是否希望看到竹子的摩天大樓？《神化》模組可以實現你的這個夢想！現在仙人掌、竹子和甘蔗的高度限制都被提高了！提高到多少？我也不知道，世界高度限制有多高呢？

original: Welcome to mystical agriculture, the place where you can farm most fundamental resources in the game!
translation: 歡迎來到神秘農業，在這裡你可以種植遊戲中最基本的資源！

original: To get our own bee farm going, we'll have to find us some bees... and capture them.
translation: 要建造自己的蜜蜂農場，首先需要找到一些蜜蜂......然後把牠們抓回來。

original: Right-clicking a bee with this will capture it!
translation: 用它右鍵點擊蜜蜂，就能捕捉牠!

original: Adventuring can also net you some &6Sturdy Bee Cages&r, so keep an eye out!
translation: 四處探險還能讓你獲得一些&6堅固的蜜蜂龍&r，所以要多加留意!

original: With the vanilla Beehive, we'll use this to craft an &eAdvanced Beehive&r. It can be Oak or any kind of wood.
translation: 有了原版蜂箱，就能用它來製作一個&e進階蜂箱&r。可以用橡木或任何一種木材製作。

original: Bees will fly in and out of these, and drop off Honeycombs in the inventory. You can also insert glass bottles to get Honey Bottles.
translation: 蜜蜂會在蜂箱中飛進飛出，並在裡面留下蜂巢。你也可以放玻璃瓶進去，就可以取得蜂蜜。

original: Wood Nests are used to lure Carpenter Bees and the Blue Banded Bee.
translation: 木巢用來引誘木匠蜂和藍帶蜂。

original: Dark Oak Nests lures 3 different bees.
translation: 黑橡木巢能引誘3種不同的蜜蜂。

original: These can be placed in any Overworld Biome.
translation: 它們可以放置於主世界的任何一種生態域中。
