original: Can be used in any Overworld biome
translation: 可以在主世界中的任何一種生態域中使用。

original: The Stone Nest can be placed in any overworld biome to lure in a Mason Bee or Digger Bee.
translation: 石巢可以放置在主世界的任何一種生態域中，以引誘石匠蜂或挖掘蜂。

original: Lures Bees in any Overworld Biome
translation: 在主世界的任何一種生態域中引誘蜜蜂。
主世界的任何一種生態域

original: Once you have the Allthemodium and Vibranium Bees, breed them together to get an Unobtainium Bee.
translation: 獲得ATM金屬蜂和汎金屬蜂後，讓牠們繁殖，之後就能獲得難得素蜂。

original: To breed: Feed the Allthemodium Bee 4 ingots of Vibranium, then feed the Vibranium Bee 4 ingots of Unobtainium.
translation: 繁殖方法:餵給ATM金屬蜂4個汎金屬錠，再餵給汎金屬蜂4個難得素錠。

original: Spawned using a Soul Sand Nest in the Nether.
translation: 利用地獄裡的靈魂沙蜂巢生成。

original: Covalence dusts have &lhigh&r EMC values and trade in for lots of items. You will use these to trade early on.
translation: 共價粉具有 &l高&rEMC，可以用來換取許多物品。在遊戲前期可以用它進行交易。

original: The alchemical chest is a bigger chest.. but most importantly, it will be used for important crafting recipes.
translation: 鍊金術儲物箱是一個更大的箱子.. 但最重要的是，它將被用於重要的合成配方。

original: The alchbag is a portable alchemical chest, basically a free big backpack!
translation: 煉金術提袋是一個攜帶式鍊金術儲物箱，基本上就是個免費的大背包!

original: To get the manasteel ingots needed for the philosopher's stone, you will need some mana. Go a little bit through the &aBotania&r questline to get these ingots.
translation: 要獲得製作賢者之石所需的魔力鋼錠，你需要一些魔力。稍微進行一下植物魔法任務線來獲取這些錠。

original: When summoning a philosopher's stone in the &eSummoning Altar&r, you will need TNT as the catalyst. \n \n&lAdd it last&r
translation: 在召喚祭壇中召喚賢者之石時，你需要使用 TNT 作為催化劑。\n\n&l最後加入&r

original:
The Philosopher's Stone is gotten via a summoning altar. It doesn't get used up in crafting recipes 
 
This stone can do quite a bit. It can be used as a portable crafting table when you press 'c'. It can turn mobs from one to another when you press 'r', it can turn in-world blocks from one to another if you right click, and it can be charged when you press 'v' in order to transform more in-world blocks! Shift+V to uncharge. 
 
&lCheck JEI for what it can transform!&r
translation:
賢者之石通過召喚祭壇獲得，不會在合成配方中被消耗。

這塊石頭功能強大。按下 'c' 時，可以當成攜帶式工作台使用。按下 'r' 時，可以將一種生物轉變為其他生物。右鍵點擊時，可以將世界中的一種方塊轉換成其他方塊。按下 'v' 時，可以充能以便更多世界方塊轉換!按住 Shift+V 可以取消充能。

&l查看 JEI 以了解它能夠進行哪些轉換!&r

original: This torch pushes all hostile mobs away within a 5 block radius!
translation: 這個火把可以把半徑5格的怪物都推開!

original: The Metallurgic Infuser is used to craft core crafting components throughout Mekanism.
translation: 通用機械主要的合成材料需要用冶金灌注機來合成。

original: The machine works by infusing a material (middle-left slot) with an \"infuser\" (far-left slot).
translation: 冶金灌注機將「注入劑」（放在左側的格子）灌注到材料中。

original: This is also how you get Steel Ingots.
translation: 這也是製作鋼錠的方法。

original: This machine works like a Macerator or Pulverizer, and will break ores down into dusts.
translation: 富集倉和磨粉機類似，能夠將礦物磨成粉狀。

original: This breaks 3 raw ores down into 4 dusts.
translation: 富集倉將 3 個原礦分解成 4 個粉

original: This is the start of your Ore Factory. It can also be upgraded to a factory machine, increasing the slots of use.
translation: 你可以由此開始你的礦物處理工廠，並且富集倉還能升級成工廠機器，將會增加額外的欄位。

original: The Heat Generator has 2 modes to generate power:
translation: 熱力發電機有兩種發電模式:

original: &9Active:&r Placing combustible materials such as coal or wood into the generator will burn the fuel to create power.
translation: &9主動式發電:&r把煤炭、木材等可燃物放進發電機，透過燃燒燃料來產生能量。

original: This generator will burn Bio Fuel into energy. It produces around 140FE/t.
translation: 這個發電機可以將生物燃料燃燒成能量。它大約可以產生140FE/t的能量。

original: If you're wondering if it is worth making this upgrade, the answer is yes.
translation: 如果你在考慮是否值得進行這次升級，答案是肯定的。

original: This version produces 105.6FE/t. It also can be used to add extra heat to Thermal Evaporation Plants.
translation: 這個版本的產能為105.6FE/t。它還可以用來為熱力蒸餾塔增加額外的熱量。

original: This is a great option for generating power.
translation: 這是一個不錯的發電選擇。

original: This generates around 40FE/t, and increases based on how high you are. The higher the Y level, the more power it produces!
translation: 它能產生大約40FE/t的能量，並且會根據你所放置的高度而增加。Y軸的高度越高，它產生的能量就越多！

original: Mekanism is a tech mod that will change the way you play Minecraft.
translation: 通用機械是個科技模組，它將會改變你玩Minecraft的方式。

original: The mod focuses on breaking down materials to their chemical makeup, and getting the best out of every material you come across.
translation: 這個模組著重於將材料分解為化學成分，並充分利用所得到的任何材料。

original: This mod features Hydrogen-Powered Jetpacks, a mini-robotic friend, reactors, a Digital Miner to automate mining, and much, much more.
translation: 這個模組包含了噴射背包、機器人、反應堆、自動採礦的數位採礦機，和更多、更多的東西。

original: The Start of Your Own Factory
So far, to \"double\" our ingot output, your setup should look something like this:
translation: 目前為止，想要獲得「雙倍」的鋼錠輸出，你的生產線應該像這樣：

original: Raw Ore goes into your &aPurification Chamber&r, which is being fed &aOxygen&r from an &6Electrolytic Separator&r.
translation: 原礦進入&a淨化倉&r，淨化倉需要的&a氧氣&r由&6電解分離器&r取得。

original: It then outputs the product into the &aCrusher&r, which converts the ore clumps into \"dirty dusts\". This \"Dirty Dust\" is fed into an &aEnrichment Chamber&r, which converts the \"Dirty Dust\" into the appropriate \"Ore Dust.\"
translation: 然後，淨化倉將輸出的碎塊傳送到 &a粉碎機&r，將礦物碎塊轉換為「汙濁的粉塵」。這些「汙濁的粉塵」會輸入&a富集倉&r，將「汙濁的粉塵」轉換為相應的「礦粉」。

original: The &aEnrichment Chamber&r then feeds into your preferred smelter of choice. You follow?
translation: 接著，&a富集倉&r會把礦粉送進你選擇的熔爐。你明白了嗎?

original: The &9Enchanting Apparatus&r is used to craft various items within the mod. It requires Source to work.
translation: &9附魔裝置&r用來製作模組中的各種物品。它需要魔源才能工作。

original: Start by placing an Arcane Core in the ground, then place the Enchanting Apparatus on top of it. Surround the Apparatus with Arcane Pedestals.
translation: 首先，將奧術核心放在地上，然後把附魔裝置放在它上面。再用奧術基座環繞這個結構。

original: The &aPure Daisy&r is one of the first flowers you'll create!
translation: &a白雛菊&r將會是你製作的第一朵花之一

original: This flower will convert up to 8 nearby &2Wooden Logs&r or &9Stone&r into &2Livingwood&r or &9Livingrock&r, respectively. This only converts in a 1 block radius around the flower.
translation: 這朵花將會把周圍8個&2原木&r或&9石頭&r分別轉換為&2活木&r或&9活石&r。轉換範圍只有花朵周圍 1 格半徑。

original: Use a &bPure Daisy&r to convert Stone into Livingrock!
translation: 使用&b白雛菊&r將石頭轉換為活石！

original: Use a &bPure Daisy&r to convert Wooden Logs into Livingwood!
translation: 用&b白雛菊&r將原木轉換為活木！

original: With our &bLivingrock&r we've created, we can now make the &9Mana Pool&r.
translation: 有了&b活石&r之後，我們就可以製作&9魔力池&r了。

original: The Mana Pool is our storage for our Mana we generate. Once it has some mana stored inside, we can begin converting specific resources into Mana resources, like Manasteel, Mana Diamonds. To create these resources, throw the item into the pool with enough mana inside to convert the item.
translation: 魔力池是用來儲存我們產出的魔力的儲存空間，當內部儲存了一些魔力，我們即可將特定資源轉換為魔力素材，好比如 魔力鋼、魔力鑽石。為了製作這些素材，我們需要將其丟進有足夠魔力的魔力池去轉換它們。

original: To &bgenerate mana&r, you'll need to create a &2Generating Flower&r, like the &9Hydroangeas&r or the &cEndoflame&r.
translation: 為了&b產生魔力&r，你會需要製作&2產能花&r，像是&9水繡球&r或是&c火紅蓮&r。

original: Note: The Mana Pool stores a massive amount of mana. To see how much Mana is stored, try looking at one while holding the &2Wand of the Forest&r.
translation: 注：魔力池可以儲存巨量的魔力，要查看儲存了多少魔力，請嘗試拿著&2森林法杖&r查看其中的魔力。

original: By tossing in certain items into a &bMana Pool&r, you can infuse them with &9Mana&r.
translation: 透過投擲某些物品至&b魔力池&r，你可以對其注入&9魔力&r。

original: To see how much mana is needed for the item, make sure to check the recipe in JEI!
translation: 要查看需要多少魔力，請務必用JEI檢查配方！

original: The &2Wand of the Forest&r is a must-have item if you want to continue your journey in Botania.
translation: &2森林法杖&r是植物魔法必不可少的物品。

original: The wand has two modes: &aBind&r and &9Function&r.
translation: 這隻法杖有兩種模式:&a綁定&r和&9工作&r模式。

original: &aBind mode&r is used to bind flowers and blocks together in Botania. Start by sneak-right clicking the first block or flower you want, then sneak-right click another block or flower to bind them together.
translation: &a綁定模式&r用來綁定花朵和方塊。先蹲下右鍵你要綁定的方塊或花朵，然後再蹲下右鍵要綁定的另一個方塊或花朵，就可以將其綁定在一起。

original: &9Function Mode&r essentially acts like a wrench, and is used to rotate blocks.
translation: &9工作模式&r可以讓法杖變成扳手，用來旋轉方塊。

original: What if I told you that the Demon's Fruit is flammable?
translation: 如果我告訴你惡魔之果是可以燃燒的呢？

original: Throwing our &cDemon's Dream Fruit&r down and setting it on fire will create &dSpiritfire&r. This is how we'll convert some overworld items into &9Otherworld&r materials.
translation: 丟出&c惡魔夢果&r並點火會製造出&d靈火&r。這是把主世界的物品轉換為&9異界&r材料的方法。

original: Using &dSpiritfire&r, we can convert several Overworld mats into their Otherworld variants. You can also find several Otherworld mats by going under the effects of the &bThird Eye&r. There are crafting recipes for the basic materials by throwing them into &dSpiritfire&r.
translation: 我們可以用&d靈火&r將一些主世界的材料轉換為它們的異界變種。你也可以在&b第三隻眼&r效果下找到數種異界材料。這裡有一些一些基本材料的合成表，將材料丟進&d靈火&r來製作。

original: &bAndesite&r converts to &3Otherstone&r, which can be used to light a permanent &dSpiritfire&r.
translation: &b安山岩&r可以轉換成&3異界石&r，異界石可以點燃不會熄滅的&d靈火&r。

original: This thing is extremely cheap, and repairs the tools in your inventory!
translation: 這東西超級便宜，會自動修復你身上的物品！

original: Place this thing on top of your cobble gen and it'll automatically compress everything it recieves, left click to extract! \n \n&lRight click it with an item before trying to pipe into it!&r
translation: 把它放在鵝卵石製造機上，它能自動壓縮所有接收到的物品，左鍵取出！ \n \n&l先對它右鍵保存一個物品後，才能開始自動輸入該物品！&r

original: Using &bBulk Haunting&r from create, you can convert sand to soul sand. Use an encased fan to blow air through soul fire (flint and steel on soul sand), and it'll convert sand to soul sand on the other side.
translation: 使用動力機械模組的&b批次喚魂&r，就能將沙轉換成靈魂砂。使用鼓風機吹風穿過靈魂火 ( 打火石對靈魂砂點火 )，在另一側被風吹到的沙會轉換成靈魂砂。

original: You can make more dirt using gravel and dirt to make coarse dirt, then tilling it with &ba hoe&r to make farmland. Mine that farmland and get &edouble the dirt&r you started with (by sacrificing gravel).
translation: 你能用礫石和泥土製作粗泥，然後用&b鋤&r耕它變成泥土。挖下泥土後比起初始材料就能取得&e兩倍的泥土&r ( 消耗礫石 )。

original: Place an ore inside this thing and jump on it to squeeze the ore into 2 raw ore (sometimes). Give it a redstone signal to reset it after you squeeze. \n \nHint: Place some armor stands on top :)
translation: 把礦放入其中，然後在上方跳躍擠壓這個原礦，變成 2 個原礦（有機率）。給予紅石訊號重置擠壓機。\n \n提示：在上方放一些盔甲座 :)

original: An ore hammer, 4 coal, and iron dust. Not a pretty recipe, but you will need this..
translation: 一個礦鎚，4 個煤炭和一個鐵粉。不是一個漂亮的配方，但你會需要的...

original: Pipe upgrades allow for filtering the items wherever you're inputting from, but not where you're outputting to. \n \nUse this tool to select an output, then inside the filter GUI of a pipe upgrade, do the filtering.
translation: 管道升級能讓你過濾輸出端，但無法過濾目的地的輸入端。 \n \n使用這個工具來選定輸出目的地的容器，然後在管道升級終設定過濾的介面，設定目的地的過濾。

original: In case you're about to use lava for power. Crucibles make lava 60x faster when you place them on top of this. \n \nYou should probably be piping in cobble at this point
translation: 以防萬一你打算使用熔岩發電。把坩堝放在這個上面，提供 60 倍快的速度生產熔岩。 \n \n此時或許你該使用管道輸入鵝卵石了。

original: This can store all your lava! well, 32 buckets of it at least.
translation: 這能儲存你全部的熔岩！好吧，至少 32 桶啦。

original: This will compact EVERYTHING in a chest or backpack. Ore chunks will become ores, and diamonds/emeralds/coal and whatnot will be compacted into blocks.
translation: 這會打包儲物箱或背包內的所有東西。礦塊會打包成原礦，而鑽石，綠寶石，煤炭之類的會被打包成方塊。

original: Some mobs have particles around them, and when you kill them, they drop an &eAbility Totem&r. Right click to open them, then select the ability, then click the left button to add them to your character. \n \nYou can use multiple to level up the potion effect, example: &bSpeed I&r -> &bSpeed II&r. &eSaturation&r can make it so you never have to eat again! To remove them, use an &eAbility Bottle&r.
translation: 有些生物會圍繞著粒子效果，而當你擊殺後，會掉落一個&e能力圖騰&r。右鍵開啟圖騰，然後選擇能力，然後點擊左箭頭將能力加入你的角色。 \n \n你能使用多個升級這些藥水效果，例如：&b速度 I&r -> &b速度 II&r。 &e飽食&r能讓你永遠不用再吃東西！要移除這些效果，使用&e能力罐&r。

original:
Flux networks are the most op mod for power transfer. Start by getting flux dust in &bThe End&r by doing the following: 
 
1. Go to the center portal of the end island. 
 
2. Throw a stack of &credstone&r onto the bedrock 
 
3. Place a piece of obsidian one block above and left click it, crushing the redstone into flux dust. Once you have a flux block you won't need to use bedrock as the base.
translation:
通量網路是最 OP 的能量傳輸模組。在&b終界&r製作些通量粉來開始，做法如下： 
 
1. 到終界島嶼中央的傳送門。 
 
2. 丟一組&c紅石&r在基岩上。 
 
3. 在基岩上方空一格處放置黑曜石，然後左鍵點它，這會將紅石壓成通量粉。一旦有了通量方塊後，就能在家製作而不用再使用基岩。

original:
&lPlease read to see how flux networks work&r. 
 
&bFlux Plugs&r pull power from a system. Place a flux plug, open it, click the plus at the top right to create a new network. 
 
&bFlux Points&r send power that flux plugs pull. You can have multiple flux plugs and points. To use the flux point: place it, right click it, in menu icon (second button on top) select the network of your flux plug. If you happen to need more power transfer enable bypass limit on &lBOTH&r the flux plug and point. 
 
The &bFlux Controller&r can provide infinite wireless power transfer to the player (so long as the chunk is loaded). Select the third tab in the menu on top, click all of the slots you can, then enable the wireless charging!
translation:
&l請閱讀這些關於通量網路如何使用的資訊&r。 
 
&b通量網路輸入點&r從一個系統中提取能量。放置一個通量網路輸入點，點開它，點擊上方最右邊加號的圖標，建立一個新網路。 
 
&b通量網路存取點&r將通量網路輸入點處輸入的能量輸出。你可以同時使用多個輸入點與存取點。如何使用通量網路存取點：放下它，右鍵點開，在選單的圖示中（上方第二個）選擇通量網路輸入點的網路。若你想要更大的電力傳輸率，在&l兩端&r打開不限速度，輸入點和存取點。 
 
&b通量網路控制器&r能提供玩家無限的無線充電（只要區塊有載入）。選擇上方第三個頁籤，點開能點的所有欄位，然後開啟無線充能！

original: With the basics done, it's time to see what we need to do to get the &6&lATM Star&r&r. This won't be easy...
translation: 基礎都打好了之後，是時候看看製作 &6&lATM 之星&r&r需要些什麼了。這不是件容易的事...

original: Placing this in the left slot of the &6Ore Laser Base&r will make it mine! At least for the ores that the white laser lens sees. Check JEI to see what ores are found with which lenses.
translation: 放入&6礦物雷射基座&r左側的欄位中就能讓它開始虛空挖礦！至少挖的到白色雷射透鏡看的到的礦。至 JEI 查看白色雷射透鏡能找到些什麼礦。

original: You can summon one of these in order to get a &ePiglich Heart&r needed for the star. This is extremely expensive though so don't worry about it now.
translation: 你能召喚一隻豬布林巫妖取得&e豬布林巫妖之心&r，這是 ATM 之星的必需品。召喚成本相當昂貴，所以現在先不急著處理它。

original: You can use emeralds to make tools and armor, just as you would with diamonds (except these are even better).
translation: 你能使用綠寶石製作工具和裝備，就像你做鑽石版本的一樣（除了綠寶石版本的更好用）。

original: Alright, now you HAVE to make a laser base as was suggested in the &6Allthemodium&r chapter. This will be necessary for getting certain ores you normally can't, like &bFluorite&r, needed for &dMekanism&r. Place a laser base in the middle, and then laser drills around it facing the laser base (this makes them point down). \n \nYou can put much more drills than the example below, but you can do this too.
translation: 好的，現在你必須打造一套雷射基座，如同 &6ATM 金屬&r章節中建議的那樣。這是一般方法中，取得拿不到的特定資源的必要方式，例如&d通用機械&r模組中必備的&b氟石&r。將雷射基座放在中間，然後四周放上雷射鑽（雷射鑽面向基座）。 \n \n你能放置比下圖中更多的雷射鑽，但也可以只放一台。

original: You can get ice by mixing a snowball and water in a barrel. Alternatively, you can use the easiest method, alchemistry (pump water into atomizer for H2O, then use a compactor), or go through a little bit of &aBotania&r. \n \nIf you chose snowballs, I suggest the &bEntropy Manipulator&r from &bApplied Energistics 2&r.
translation: 在橡木桶中可混和雪球和水製作冰。或者你也可以使用最簡單的方法，煉金化學（把水灌入原子化機取得 H2O，然後用封壓機製作冰），或是發展一點&a植物魔法&r。 \n \n若你要的是雪球，我推薦使用&b應用能源 2&r 的&b熵變機械手臂&r。

original: Just before you get auto sieves, you should know about this! The igneous extruder can generate many useful stones for crushing. You must physically place the blocks on the sides/below it, so if you place this between lava and water it will make cobble. \n \nAs always, check JEI to see what you can make with this machine.
translation: 在你真的開始自動篩礦前，你應該知道這個！岩石擠壓機能生產許多有用的石頭種類。你必須把方塊物理放置在機器的側面或底部，當你將其放在熔岩和水之間，它會生產鵝卵石。 \n \n和往常一樣，到 JEI 查看這台機器還能生產些什麼東西。

original: The Thermo gen starts off better, but as you upgrade this thing, it becomes MUCH better. All this needs is a constant source of lava, and with a superheating element, this should be no problem!
translation: 熔岩發電機是個好的開始，但你可以升級這個東西，使其更加強大。這只需要源源不絕的熔岩，靠著導熱元件，應該是沒問題！

original: Fluid Extractor - Extracts Latex from logs, some give more latex than others
translation: 流體抽取器 - 從原木中抽取樹脂，某些原木含有較多樹脂。

original: Block Placer - to automate the log placing
translation: 方塊放置器 - 原木放置自動化

original: Acacia Logs give the most latex
translation: 相思木原木能提供最多樹脂

original: This is how you get Ether Gas
translation: 這就是獲得乙醚氣體的方法。

original: Check JEI for acceptable logs and latex amounts. Best log to use is Acacia.
translation: 用JEI查看可取得的原木及樹脂含量。最適合使用的是相思木。
友善生物 -> 更多粉色史萊姆

original: Automate block placing/breaking using these, especially useful when automating latex.
translation: 用這些自動放置/破壞方塊，特別是在樹脂自動化時很好用。

original: Use some sort of wither-proof glass.
&cHope you don't run out of power, because if you do... well... i hope you are ready to fight the &0Wither&r.
translation: &c希望你沒有把能源用光，因為如果用光了……嗯……希望你準備好要跟&0凋零&r戰鬥了。

original: Welcome to &bIndustrial Foregoing&r, one of the main resources in this mod, is &fLatex.&r Its used to craft machine frames, needed to make.. well... machines, and upgrades.
translation: 歡迎來到&b工業先鋒&r，這個模組的主要資源是&f樹脂&r。它可以用來合成機器框架，當製作…嗯…機器，及升級的時候會用到它們。

original: Making Latex is pretty simple, &aFluid Extractor&r extracts Latex from &6Logs&r (Acacia gives the most).
Auto farm for rocks and more!
translation: 岩石以及更多資源的自動農場！

original:
&lWelcome to XyCraft!&r 
 
This series of mods is mostly dedicated to XyCraft: World and Machines! 
World gives us the Gems which can be obtained from sieving Dust.
translation:
&l歡迎來到 Xy 工藝！&r 
 
這章主要會針對 Xy 工藝：世界與機器這兩個模組作介紹！ 
世界這模組主要加入了寶石，能透過篩塵土來取得。

original: The Igneous Extruder is a Thermal Machine but is the only way of getting Kivi without having Kivi. Place the Ingeous Extruder down, but Obsidian below it, and Water and Lava on it's sides. It will start spawning Items into it's inventory, it doesn't need power.
translation: 岩石擠製機是熱力模組的機器，但是在取得第一個奇石前，唯一取得奇石的方法。將岩石擠製機放出來，下方放黑曜石，然後兩側分別放水和熔岩。擠製機內就能開始生產奇石，且不需要電。

original: Kivi can be used for a couple of things, mainly decoration or machines. You'll need Kivi for Machine Frames and the other Machines with XyCraft. It can also be used with Xy Gems and stonecutting for Deco.
translation: 奇石能用來做一些事情，主要是裝飾方塊和機器。你需要奇石製作 Xy 工藝模組的機器基座以及其他的機器。也能和幻晶寶石組合或切石機切石製作一些裝飾方塊。

original: Reinforce the Kivi with Aluminum and you'll get Machine Frames which are needed for all the Machines.
translation: 用鋁強化奇石能做出機器基座，這是所有 Xy 機器的必需品。

original: The Water Block acts as Water without the whole moving part. Cobble Gens can be made with them, farmland can be watered with it, just can't MLG clutch with it. (Fish will also try to get into it but will still die).
translation: 水方塊就是水，而沒有流動的部分。可用來打造原版的鵝卵石製造機，農田也能被其濕潤，只是不能做到高空水這種大師級操作。（魚也會試著遊進去，但難免一死。）

original: The Accelerated Planter works similar to normal Farmland but with some changes. It's automatIically watered and it's faster than normal Farmland. How much faster? Idk!
translation: 加速種植器和普通的耕地類似，但略有不同。它會自動變濕且作物生長比普通的耕地更快。快多少呢？窩不知道！

original: The Ignition Plate spawns fire infront of it when given a Redstone Signal. It will put out the fire when the Signal is stopped.
translation: 點火板，當給予紅石訊號時，能在它面對的方向點火。當訊號停止石會將火熄滅。

original: Fluid Void is a block that stops all water connected to it. Source block or flowing, Anything within 1 block is gone.
translation: 流體虛空是個能將所有接觸面碰觸到的水停止的方塊。無論是水源方塊或是流動的水，任何碰觸到 1 格位置的水都會消失。

original: Light Field doesn't actually show much light... but it does work like a Mega Torch. Mobs won't spawn in a set area of it. How big is that area? Around 32 block radius from it (Estimated, not exact).
translation: 光場本身雖然不發光... 但它的功能類似超級火把。生物不會在它的指定區域內生成。有多大範圍呢？大概以它為中心半徑 32 格。（大概大概。）

original: Balloon-On-A-Stick is an early and restrictive source of Creative Flight. Place down the stick and you'll be attached to a balloon! Double touch space to start Flying just not too far. Go too far and you'll get detached, then you'll fall.
translation: 棍子上的氣球是個遊戲初期一個有限制的創造飛行方法。將它放出來，你就會被氣球綁住！雙擊空白鍵就能開始飛行，只是距離不遠。離太遠的話線會斷掉，然後你就會摔下來。

original: Extrator works like the Ingeous Extruder but for more! It will 'grow' the block or item beneath it and move it to an Inventory above it. This can be used like for a cobble gen, any other stone gen, amethyst gen, or even Dragon Egg gen!
translation: 提取器的作用和岩石擠製機類似，但能做到更多事！它能從下方的方塊或物品中，「長」出東西，並將它移至上方的容器中。能用於生產鵝卵石，或其他種類的石頭，紫水晶，甚至是龍蛋！

original: XyCraft gives us a great Fluid Tank mulitblock!
translation: Xy 工藝提供了一種很棒的多方塊結構的流體儲罐！

original: To actually get Water or other Fluids into the Tank you'll need some sort of Pipe. Luckily they are all called Pipe(s/z) which helps us not to be confused. \n \n The Hydro Pump can automatically put Water into them at a slow rate but also for free!
translation: 要真的將水或其他流體導入儲罐中，你需要某種類型的管道。幸運的是這些全部都叫做「管道」，這使我們不會太過困擾。 \n \n水泵能自動將水導入儲罐中，速率雖慢但是免費的！

original: The Valve is the Heart of your Tank. No Valve, no Tank. This is also where you'll pump, or pipe, Water ,or Fluids, into it.
translation: 閥門是儲罐的心臟。沒有閥門，沒有儲罐。這也是你把水或其他流體導入的位置。

original: Now we get to actually making the Tank! First off you need Building Blocks and atleast 1 Valve. Glass and Item IOs are optional. The Tank must be made of a frame of building blocks. Building blocks are anything that isn't transparent, gravity influenced, or natural dirt and grass. Can'ts: Gravel, Grass, and Glass. Items like stone, wood, or metal must make the frame; the edges. Glass, Valve, and Item IOs must be placed in the walls and the inside must be hollow. It can only be 13x13x13 big. Once you done all that, right click the Valve and it will either say 'Formed' or will tell you the problem.
translation: 現在我們要來真正的打造這個儲罐！首先你需要一些建築方塊以及至少一個閥門。玻璃或物品 IO 可有可無。儲罐的邊框必須是建築方塊。建築方塊不能是透明方塊，受重力影響的方塊，或泥土及草地。也就是不能是礫石，草地和玻璃。石頭，木頭或是金屬等方塊都可以用在框架上，也就是邊。玻璃，閥門和物品 IO 必須放在牆面上，且整個結構的中心必須是中空的。最大能有 13x13x13 這麼大。建好後，對閥門右鍵，它會告訴你「已成型」或告訴你問題出在哪。

original: Item IOs (IO stands for Input Output) give us the ability to transport items in and out of the Tank. Like buckets to be filled with Water. They can be toggled for Output and Input.
translation: 物品 IO（IO 的意思是輸入和輸出）使我們能透過它，將物品傳輸至多方塊儲罐中。像是放入鐵桶能自動裝填為水桶。物品 IO 能切換輸入或輸出模式。

original: XyCraft has some Item storage and manipulation. Not much, but still some!
translation: Xy 工藝有一些物品儲存與操作的機制。不多，但有一些！

original: Fabricator is the Auto-Crafter. It will take Items from the Inventory below and make a set recipe. You can lock recipes with CTRL Click. It will need to pipe out the created items though.
translation: 裝配機就是個自動合成器。他能自動從鄰近的容器中取出物品，並合成指定的配方。編寫好配方後，可在在介面中 Ctrl 左鍵點擊鎖定配方。但合成好的物品需要靠管道輸出就是了。

original: The Collector works as a very cheap Absorption Hopper. It will pick up all items within a 3 block radius and put it in the Inventory below or it's own. It can be turned off with Redstone!
translation: 收集器就是個非常便宜的吸收漏斗。它會自動撿起半徑三格內的所有物品，放入下方的容器或保存於自身中。能用紅石關閉！

original: The Void Container makes any Inventory a Trash Can. Put it ontop of the Inventory and BOOM no more items!
translation: 虛空容器能讓任何容器都變成垃圾桶。將它放在容器的正上方，然後看哪！東西都不見了呢！

original: The B in Roy G. Biv
The R in Roy G. Biv
Can you tell me the Time?

translation: 精靈球，我是說力量燒瓶

original:
Say 'Helllo' to ForceCraft! 
 
This mod focuses on the power of Force and using it to Infuse items! 
 
Everything is yellow!
translation:
向力量工藝說聲「嗨」！
 
這個模組專注一種稱為「力量」的能量，並用來灌注物品！ 
 
全部都是黃色的！

original: Force Ingots are what most tools and items will be made of. Listen carefully though, the recipe is kinda confusing. You take 1 Force Gem and either 2 Gold Ingots or 2 Iron Ingots and you get Force Ingot!
translation: 力量錠是大多數工具和物品製作的材料。仔細聽好，這個配方有點困惑。拿一個力量寶石和兩個金錠或兩個鐵錠合成，就能取得力量錠！

original: Force Belts work as a worse Force Pack, can't be upgraded and can't be worn. Also can have color and named with Shift Right Click.
translation: 力量腰帶比力量背包更糟糕的背包，而且還不能升級也不能穿戴在飾品欄中。但也可以手持它，Shift 右鍵改變顏色並對它命名。

original: Force Armor has similar stats between Iron and Diamond Armor but more Toughness. Another thing better with Force Armor is the ability to Infuse.
translation: 力量裝備的防禦數值介於鐵製到鑽石裝備之間，但有更多的抗擊退。比普通裝備更好的是，力量裝備能灌注。

original: Now these are fun items. For Sheep they work as normal Shears, takes off their wool. But with the other farm animals it has unique uses. Cows will drop Leather, Chickens drop Feather, Pigs Drop Bacon! Once used though they will become cold. Cold animals can't be breed and will only drop meat.
translation: 這個是個有趣的物品。對於剪刀來說，它能做到與普通剪刀一樣的事情，比如說剪羊毛。但對於一些其他眷養的動物，它有些獨特的用途。能對牛剪皮革，對雞剪羽毛，對豬剪培根！一旦剪過這些生物，它們會感到寒冷，變成愛斯基摩種。愛斯基摩種的動物無法繁殖，且擊殺只會掉落對應的肉。

original: The most important item in ForceCraft is arguably the Force Rod. First, you can only craft one with normal sticks which will give you one at 2 durability. I recommend using those on a Force Sapling so you can make a full durability one, but who am I to tell you what to do.
translation: 力量工藝模組中最重要的物品，可以說是力量權杖了。剛開始，你只能用普通的木棍合成，但只會有兩點的耐久值。建議先用它來製作力量木樹苗，就能製作滿耐久的力量權杖，但你的遊戲你做主。

original: Crafting a Force Rod with an Oak Sapling will give you a Force Sapling. It will grow into a Force Tree so you can get Force Wood to be crafted into Force Sticks. So much Force.
translation: 用一個力量權杖，和一個橡木樹苗合成會得到力量木樹苗。長大後變成力量木樹，砍下取得力量木原木，用來製作力量木棒。這句話也包含太多「力量」了吧！

original: Crafting one with a Force Stick gives you one at full durability.
translation: 用力量木棒製作的力量權杖，會是滿耐久的。

original: The Force Pickaxe has same Tier as an Iron Pickaxe, it can only mine up to Diamond Ores. The Sword does the same damage as a Diamond Sword. The Bow does the same damage as a normal bow. Axe and Shovel are the same.
translation: 力量鎬有與鐵鎬相同的挖掘等級，最硬只能挖到鑽石礦。力量劍有與鑽石劍相同的傷害。力量弓有與普通弓相同的傷害。力量斧和力量鏟則與力量鎬相同。

original: Now this is where the fun happens. Place down the Infuser and you'll notice a few parts in it's GUI. Top Left is for the Upgrade Tome, below it is where the Force Fuel goes and stays. The far right is where power will be, yes it needs RF power. The middle is where Infusing happens. Middle square is where the item to be Infused goes, like swords or armor. The ones around it is for the Infusees like Force Nuggets or Claws. The top right button in the middle brings up the Book if you have it and the bottom left is to complete the Infusion.
translation: 這是這個模組最有趣的核心機制了。將灌注台放出來，點開介面，你會看到分為幾個部分。左上方欄位是放置升級寶典的，其下方是力量燃料補充的地方。最右邊是能量欄，是的，它需要電。中間的部分則是進行灌注的地方。正中央是放入想要灌注的物品的欄位，像是劍或是裝備。圍繞著它的是放入灌注材料的欄位，像是力量粒或是蝙蝠爪。中間右上方的問號按鈕點擊後，會直接打開該模組的說明書。中間左下的箭頭按鈕，是一切就緒後開始灌注的按鈕。

original: To work the Infuser needs Fuel and Power. Fuel comes from Force Gems you can put in the Infuser or even Pipe in Liquid Force. Power needs RF, heck you can just put a Wind Generator next to it and it'll be fineee!
translation: 進行灌注會需要燃料與電。燃料由力量寶石提供，你能直接放入灌注台中，或是直接用管道輸入液態力量。電則是 RF，反正你在旁邊放個風力發電機就可以了，沒事的啦！

original: The Upgrade Tome is what determines the Tier of Infusion. It starts off at Tier 0 and goes to 7. You need 2 thins to Tier up: Force Points and Mastery. You get Force Points from Infusing and Mastery comes from using every Infusion in that Tier. To get to Tier 1 you need to infuse with a Nugget and a Claw.
translation: 升級寶典決定了你能進行哪些等級的灌注。剛開始是等級 0，最高是等級 7。需要兩種要素才能升級：力量點數和精通灌注。每次進行灌注能獲得力量點數，精通灌注則需要完成該等級所能進行的所有灌注項目。舉例來說，要升到等級 1，你需要使用力量粒和蝙蝠爪進行灌注。

original: The first Tier of infusing, it starts off at Tier 0 and needs 96 Points to Tier up.
translation: 最低階的灌注，初始為等級 0，且需要 96 力量點數才能升級。

original: The Force Nugget can be used to Infuse with a Force Sword or Force Axe, and will give them knockback!
translation: 力量粒能灌注在力量劍或力量斧上，賦予擊退效果！

original: The Claw can be used to Infuse a few different items. On Force Swords it'll give Sharpness. On Force Bows it'll give Power. On Force Armor it gives something different, the ability to Force Punch. Force Punch is what happens when you shift left click a mob with an Empty Hand. It'll do more damage than a regular punch along with cool karate noises. The more Armor with Force Punch the more damage it does.
translation: 蝙蝠爪能灌注在一些不同的物品上。灌注在力量劍上賦予鋒利效果。在力量弓上賦予強力效果。在力量裝備上賦予的效果有點不同，賦予的是力量拳的能力。力量拳觸發條件是，當你對生物空手蹲下左鍵，會比普通的空手攻擊造成更多的傷害，且還會有個酷酷的音效。穿戴更多灌注力量拳的裝備，能造成更多的傷害。

original: With each new Tier you unlock more Infusions but also more spaces in the Infuser. Tier 0 you only get 1 and in Tier 1 you get 2, which means you can now stack Infusions. Use 2 Force Nuggets to add Knockback II to a Force Sword.
translation: 升級能解鎖更多灌注的配方，同時也會開啟灌注台中更多的欄位。等級 0 時你只有一格欄位，而等級 1 時有兩格，這代表你現在可以堆疊灌注。放入兩個力量粒，就能灌注力量劍擊退 II 的效果。

original: Golden Power Source comes from Smelting Force Wood. When used on a Force Sword or Axe it'll give it Fire Aspect. When used on Force Pickaxe or Shovel it will give it Heat, which will smelt any items mined with it. When used on Force Armor it gives more Damage to the Force Punch and sets the mobs on Fire. Infuse Armor with both the Claw and Golden Power Source to get both!
translation: 金色能量源是透過熔爐熔煉力量木而來的。當灌注在力量劍或斧上，賦予燃燒效果。當灌注在力量鎬或鏟上，賦予高溫效果，意思是挖掘方塊時會自動熔煉。當貫注在力量裝備上，賦予力量拳更多傷害且會使生物著火。同時使用蝙蝠爪與金色能量源灌注裝備，同時取得兩種效果！

original: Sugar can be used to give Efficiency to Tools, make Arrows shoot and fly faster, or make Armor give you a Speed Buff. Also can be used with Force Punch items.
translation: 糖能賦予工具效率的效果，讓弓射得更快，飛得更快。或賦予裝備速度的效果。也能和力量拳的物品一起使用。

original: Lumberjack is only used with Force Axes, by Infusing them with Force Wood. Lumberjack will make it so any Logs above or below the Log you cut down will also be cut down.
translation: 伐木效果只能灌注在力量斧上，使用力量木原木灌注。伐木的效果是，砍伐任何原木時，其正上方或正下方的原木能同時被砍下。

original: Tier 2 comes after you Infuse with Sugar, Golden Power Source, and Force Wood. You get new Infusions and 3 squares to Infuse with.
translation: 等級 2 是當你使用糖，金色能量源和力量木原木灌注後升級的。現在你有三格欄位能夠進行灌注。

original: Force Pack can now hold 16 stacks or items!
translation: 力量背包現在有 16 格的儲物空間！

original: By Infusing an Upgrade Core with Flint you'll get a Grinding Core. Yes, Cores are needed to Tier up.
translation: 使用燧石灌注升級核心會取得研磨核心。沒有錯，研磨核心是升級必要的灌注。

original: Snow Cookies which are crafted with a Snowball, by itself, nothing else just a Snowball. They can be used with an Upgrade Core to make a Freezing Core, or with a Force Bow to get Freezing on it. Currently on my test world Freezing just sets mobs on fire which is kinda ironic but maybe it'll be different for you!
translation: 雪餅是由雪球合成的，只有它，沒有其他東西，就只有雪球。能用來灌注升級核心製作冰凍核心，或是灌注力量弓賦予冷凍效果。目前我測試的狀況是，冰凍效果只會讓生物著火，這有點諷刺，但或許對你而言會有所不同！

original: Blue Dye can be used to make Force Shears, rainbow! Every sheep those Shears are used on will drop random color of Wool.
translation: 藍色染料灌注力量剪刀會賦予它，彩虹！用它剪羊毛時會隨機掉落不同顏色的羊毛。

original: Okay this is gonna take a little to explain but it's important. Bottle O' Enchanting can be made a few different ways but one is with Force Rod and any Enchanting Book. Then the Bottle O' Enchanting can be used to Infuse with a Book for Experience Tome. The Experience Tome can be used with Right Click to Store EXP or can be crafted with a Force Rod to make an Upgrade Core. Those are needed for the other Infusions including using Bottle O' Enchanting to create an Experience Core. Hopefully you understood all that.
translation: 好，這會花點時間解釋，但很重要。經驗瓶有許多不同的取得方式，但其中之一是，使用力量權杖和任何附魔書合成。經驗瓶能灌注在書上變成經驗寶典。經驗寶典能右鍵使用保存經驗值，或將它與力量權杖合成製作升級核心。升級核心是是用來進行其他灌注的必需品，包含使用經驗瓶灌注升級核心製作經驗核心。說了這麼多希望你能懂。

original: Infusing Sugar with an Upgrade Core gives you a Speed Core.
translation: 使用糖灌注升級核心取得速度核心。

original: Crafting Paper and a Cookie makes a Fortune Cookie! You can eat it, craft it with a Force Rod to get a Fortune, or Infuse with it. Infusing it with a Pickaxe gives Fortune, a Sword gives Looting, and Bow or Armor gives Luck Effect.
translation: 用紙和餅乾能做出幸運餅乾！你可以吃下肚，或和力量權杖合成取得幸運籤，或拿來灌注。用幸運餅乾灌注力量鎬賦予幸運效果，力量劍賦予掠奪，弓或裝備賦予幸運效果。

original: Yes you will need to Infuse the Cores to Tier up.
translation: 沒錯，你需要灌注那個核心才能升級。

original: Quite simple, it gives Silk Touch to Force Tools.
translation: 相當單存，賦予力量工具絲綢之觸的效果。

original: Bleeding is an Effect given that's similar to Poison. Infuse Swords, Bows, or Armor with an Arrow to give Bleeding with hits.
translation: 流血的效果和藥水類似。使用箭矢灌注力量劍，弓，或裝備，擊中生物時賦予流血效果。

original: You can Infuse with an Invisibility Potion to give Armor Camo, or make a Force Rod Invisible. Armor with Camo will not make you Invisible it just won't show your Armor, just your skin.
translation: 使用隱形藥水灌注力量裝備賦予迷彩效果，或灌注力量權杖賦予隱形效果。迷彩裝備不會讓你隱形，只是不會顯示你的裝備，就只有你。

original: Now can use 5 squares to Infuse, which also means you can stack the Upgrades to their max amounts. Like Sharpness to Sharpness 5 with 5 Claws.
translation: 現在有五格可以灌注，這也代表你能堆疊這些灌注效果到最高值。像是用五個蝙蝠爪灌注鋒利 V。

original: Spider Eye Infused with Weapons or Armor make your attacks inflict Bane. Not Arachnids Bane, but Bane the Effect. Bane takes away Creepers ability to explode and Endermens ability to Teleport.
translation: 用蜘蛛眼灌注力量武器或裝備賦予禁制效果。不是節肢剋星，而是禁制效果。禁制能奪走苦力怕爆炸的能力，以及終界使者的傳送能力。

original: Infusing an Upgrade Core with a Golden Power Source makes a Heat Core. Which is needed to craft the ATM Star!
translation: 用金色能量源灌注升級核心製作高溫核心。這同時也是製作 ATM 之星所需的材料！
最終的背包升級，有 40 格！

original: These will give a Force Rod healing.
translation: 賦予力量權杖治療效果。

original: This will give Force Swords a special move to dash forwards with right click.
translation: 賦予力量劍一種特殊的移動方式，右鍵使用向前突進。

original: Infuse a Force Torch with a Clock to make a Time Torch. It can be crafted but not used due to configs. Still needed to Tier up.
translation: 用時鐘灌注力量火把製作時間火把。雖然能製作，但設定關閉了所以沒用（譯著：並沒有，是可以用的！）。但仍需要用於灌注升級。

original: Infusing items with Obsidian gives them Unbreaking! Remember to use multiple.
translation: 用黑曜石灌注物品賦予耐久效果！記得多放幾個。

original: Using an Ender Pearl with a Force Rod will allow you to teleport to a set location. A Sword with Ender will teleport a few blocks in the direction you're looking. A Bow with Ender Pearl Infusion will make mobs hit by the Bow's Arrows to teleport.
translation: 用終界珍珠灌注力量權杖賦予傳送效果，使你能傳送到綁定的座標。灌注力量劍，使其能傳送你至面對的方向一小段距離。灌注力量弓，射出的箭矢擊中的目標隨機傳送。

original: Last Tier of Infusing, Tier 7. Every Infusion and square has been unlocked. Just get the 2 Infusions and you have mastered ForceCraft.
translation: 最後一階的灌注，等級 7。所有的灌注配方和欄位都已解鎖。只差兩種灌注你就完全掌握力量工藝。

original: Quite expensive, the Treasure Core is crafted with a Nether Star, 2 Diamonds, 4 Force Ingots, and 2 Force Ingot Blocks. It can be Infused onto Swords or Axes to give them Treasure buff. When mobs are killed by the Treasure buff they drop Treasure Cards to craft Spoils Bag.
translation: 相當昂貴，寶藏核心的合成需要一個地獄之星，兩個鑽石，四個力量錠，和兩個黃金方塊。可灌注在力量劍或力量斧上，賦予寶藏效果。當生物被寶藏效果的武器擊殺時，會掉落卡片，用來製作戰利品袋。

original: Glowstone can be used on Force Rod or Bow to make whatever they hit Glow. Very exciting last Tier Infusion.
translation: 螢光石能灌注在力量權杖或力量弓上，使其擊中的生物發光。最高等級的灌注就這，真是感人。

original: Force Furnace works like a normal Furnace just with Core slot.
translation: 力量熔爐和普通熔爐的功能一樣，只是多了核心的欄位。

original: Upgrade Core is made by crafting Force Rod with an Experience Tome. You'll need to Infuse them to make the different ones. Cores will break when you take them out of the Furnace.
translation: 升級核心是使用力量權杖和經驗寶典合成製作。你必須灌注不同的材料取得不同的核心。核心取出時會銷毀。

original: Grinding Core will break down items into what they are made of. Wool to String, Doors to Wood, Gold Weighted Pressure Plate into Gold Ingots. Still needs Fuel.
translation: 研磨核心能將物品反向研磨回原材料。羊毛研磨成線，門變木材，金壓力板變金錠。也需要燃料。

original: Heat Core makes the Furnace more Efficient. A coal chunk will now smelt 2 items instead of 1.
translation: 高溫核心使熔爐運作更有效率。一個煤炭能熔煉 16 個物品而非 8 個。

original: Freezing Core will give you more recipes with Freezing items. Like snowballs from slime balls! Still needs Fuel.
translation: 冰凍核心將熔爐轉換成冰凍模式，能使用力量熔爐：冰凍的配方。例如史萊姆球能冰凍成雪球！也需要燃料。

original: Speed Core makes the Furnace faster without ruining the Fuel more.
translation: 速度核心讓熔爐運作得更快，不會再浪費更多燃料了。

original: With a similar recipe to bottles, Force Flasks are much different. They can hold Liquid Force, Milk, or animals. Shift Right click to toss the Flask at a Mob to capture them. Right click to release them.
translation: 雖然和玻璃瓶的配方長得很像，力量燒瓶的功能大有不同。它能裝液態力量，牛奶，或是動物。對生物 Shift 右鍵丟出燒瓶將其捕捉。右鍵使用放出。

original: Liquid Force is an important part of Force Craft. You can mainly get it from the Infuser, just right click it with an empty Bucket or Flask.
translation: 液態力量是力量工藝一個重要的部分。你主要能從灌注台中取得，只要拿著鐵桶或燒瓶對它右鍵。

original: The Force Engine is... well the only Energy producing block in ForceCraft. It needs 2 things to make Energy, Fuel and a Redstone Signal. The Fuel can be Liquid Force, Lava, or some other mods Fuel. It will give Energy to where it was placed down facing. It also has a second Liquid spot which helps it become more efficient. Water makes it 2 times efficient and Milk by 2.5 times.
translation: 力量引擎是... 嗯，力量工藝中唯一的一台發電機。發電需要兩件事，燃料和紅石訊號。燃料可以是液態力量，熔岩，或其他模組的燃料。它會自動將能量傳輸到面對的方向。它同時也有第二個液體欄位，這能使它更有效率。水能使其效率變 2 倍，牛奶是 2.5 倍。

original: The Force Engine can use more than just liquids, it can also use a Nether Star! By putting one in the Engine you can make tons of power. But once it's drained you're left with an Inert Core which can be used by...
translation: 力量引擎不只能使用液體發電，也能使用地獄之星！一顆地獄之星能發出大量的電。但一旦榨乾後，會變成惰性核心，這是用來...

original: Setting the Inert Core on Fire and Right Clicking it with a Force Rod you'll get a Bottled Wither. It will spawn a Wither ready to fight when Right Clicked on the ground. No waiting, no initial explosion, just Wither.
translation: 將惰性核心丟入火中，然後拿力量權杖右鍵，你會拿到瓶裝凋零。對地板右鍵放出凋零，它會立即進入戰鬥狀態。沒有等待時間，沒有初始的爆炸，就是一個嗜血的凋零。
